title: Great!!
text: Great location. The night staff is not very friendly. Room for four people and six nights without a closet or room for suitcases. Clothes stored in suitcases. Good breakfast, but repetitive, nothing varied. Breakfast area at the entrance of the hotel on a table shared with other guests. Elevators good. Cleaning well. Good experience, we would repeat

title: Wonderful start to a great vacation
text: My husband and I had a great stay in New York at Citadines Connect  Fifth Ave. Our room and bathroom were neat and clean. The bed was comfy. The staff were welcoming and accommodating. Great location close to Broadway, shopping and wonderful restaurants.

title: hassle free
text:
checked in at 1230 and they had a room available right away! Very friendly staff at reception thanks to matthew and myisha!
Fantastic team to start with. Feeling rough but they made it more special on a rainy april day. Shouldve stayed a bit longer.

title: Welcome in new york
text:
The hotel is in a very good location central to a lot of sights. We had a very nice spacious room. Super friendly and easy check in and very welcoming staff. 
Breakfast was included - croissants, coffee and fruits. Easy start to discover the city.

title: Very good excellent central location
text:
Fully recommended in the heart of Manhattan, a centrally located hotel close to 5th Avenue, the rooms are very clean, well distributed, they include a Grab & Go breakfast, ideal for solving

We received excellent service from all the staff especially Matthew

title: Good hotel
text: Excellent hotel in a beautiful location near Time Square. Nice rooms for location large. Staff could be a bit more professional. The grab to go breakfast is what you would expect. This hotel is a good base to explore NYC with bus and subway/train within walking distance.

title: Great location and service!!
text: We had a great time in NY!  The location is perfect! It is walking distance to Rockefeller center which we wanted, so we could arrive early to the Today show. You feel close to everything or a subway away. My husband and I were traveling with our daughter, so I will say the room felt a little squished, but we didn’t spend time in there only to sleep. Every staff member we meant was friendly and seemed to really want to help make our time special. We stayed 4 nights. I would really like to mention Jayline, Quewlin, Chris R., Sherica and what a great job they did! Thank you!!

title: Friendliest hotel in NYC
text: Remarkably friendly and helpful staff made my group's stay totally enjoyable. There was always someone at the desk ready to solve a problem, recommend a restaurant and provide help - even umbrellas! The rooms were updated and clean and you can't beat the location. We will definitely book more groups here.

title: Great experience
text: My thirteen year old daughter and I stayed here during our first trip to NYC! It was a great experience! Hotel was clean! We felt safe! Staff went above and beyond! Room was bigger than I expected. It is close to anything you may want to do! I was afraid the street noise would bother me at night, but, didn’t hear any!

title: Small room but good hotel
text:
We stayed from February 8 to 13, 2024, we were 3 adults in 1 room with 2 double beds.
Room a little small, not possible to open a suitcase on the floor, forced to do it on the bed. No cupboards to store our belongings so we had to open and close our suitcase every day. We had to ask 3 times for toilet paper to come to the room…
These are the negative points of this hotel.

For the rest, the hotel is top notch: great location and staff! Not too much noise. Safe in the room and all toiletries needed.

Takeaway breakfast: choice of pastries, coffee/tea/orange juice in a carton, and fruit. The breakfast was good. Unfortunately as it is takeaway, there is only one table at the reception which quickly fills up so we ate our breakfast in the room before going out. But we knew before coming that it was a takeaway breakfast so no worries.

title: Worth it!
text:
Very nice space for a short stay, it’s clean and well acclimatized. The place es very well located. Near to times square and the subway. For the price, it is worth it.  
I just wish it had more security at the entrance, but the truth is that it was a very quiet place.

title: Nice find and great service!
text: Great check in experience with David, he was helpful and gave us some great tips! Close to everything, clean and quiet. Definitely recommend for solo travelers, couples or small families. Get to the city and enjoy this spot as a little respite from the NYC action!

title: Close to everything
text: I live Upstate New York and just came down to NYC alone to do some shopping. Lots of high end stores but also some of my favorite stores like Free People and Victoria’s Secrets. I had a wonderful time Rooms are small but clean and comfortable. Coffee every day. Close to everything. Good shopping and will stay here again. Highly recommend.

title: A guest in my own city
text: In the midst of a remodel I found myself in need of a hotel in my own City for just one night. Luck was on my side as I landed at Citadine 5th Ave. While a busy hotel, the front desk staff, David in particular, was extremely pleasant and helpful. The room was clean and safe; the breakfast a nice touch and the location couldn't be more convenient for visitors and NYers alike. I would recommend this hotel to out of town friends without hesitation.

title: Hidden Gem in the City <3
text: Charming little hotel in the heart of Midtown, which made for an easy commute around the city. The grab and go breakfast was conveinent for busy mornings. Stayed in the Premier King Suite and it was so spacious. Really nice to have a sectioned off bedroom and living room. VERY COZY BED. To top it off, the staff were very kind and helpful. Smaller hotel, so really get those personable interactions with the staff. Highly recommend!

title: Location, location, location!
text: The rooms are not huge but they’re cozy and comfortable. The beds are comfortable as are the pillows. Everything was very clean. Internet connection was excellent but the best of all is the location. We were able to walk from port authority. Rockefeller center is  few blocks away. St. Patricks 3-4 blocks away and the street is full of amazing restaurants. The Turkish restaurant next to the hotel is just awesome! Will be back!

title: Ridiculously bad experience
text: I complained to the front desk during my stay about an incident where the cleaner opened my room door early in the morning without my permission. After complaining, the front desk stated that the housekeeping manager was out and asked when I would be back at the hotel at that night. I told him I would be back at 7pm. However when I returned, the Housekeeping Manager was not there waiting for me and I was told she would not be available until tomorrow. However, during the next three days of my stay, neither the front desk nor the housekeeping manager reached out to me with any explanation. I am deeply disappointed. You are the ones who should be responsible for this. I shouldn't have to ask repeatedly and wait in my room for you to contact me. Overall, I was disappointed by the cleaner's invasion of my privacy and the attitude of your hotel manager that it was not a matter of concern.

title: Great little gem
text: Hotel staff were really helpful. The room was clean & equipped with everything I needed, hairdryer iron etc. The breakfast was good, filling & plentiful, you could help yourself to as much as you wanted. Hotel location was perfect, close enough to Times Square but far enough away not to be aware of the noise.

title: Great Experience at Citadines Connect Fifth Avenue
text: When we first arrived at Citadines Connect, my husband and I were greeted by Christopher and were made to feel right at home. The king bed in our quaint room was comfortable featuring fluffy pillows. On our second and last night, we met David Rodriguez at the concierge who went out of his way to be helpful as we returned from a play, drenched from a huge rainstorm in NYC. He answered all our inquiries in prep for our departure the next day.  Despite the rain, we found the location of the hotel particularly convenient to walking to the best of midtown Manhattan shopping, restaurants, and Broadway. We will be back for sure.

title: Manhattan NY
text: Great location, price and atmosphere. It looks recently renovated to me. Excellent option for a trip with the family. Very close to Times Square, subway and tourist attractions. The breakfast offered in the "grab and go" format was very good and there was free coffee available at the lobby almost all day long. I recommend!

title: Hotel très bien situé mais chambres minuscules
text: L'hôtel est très bien situé, à 50 mètres de la 5eme avenue et à 2 pas de time square. La chambre pour 4 personnes était minuscule (je sais que c'est New-York mais quand même). Il est impossible d'ouvrir plus de 2 valises (pourtant pas grosses).... il n'y a que du jus d'orange et des viennoiseries et 2 fruits.  Café à disposition mais pas d'eau. Le personnel est sympathique.

title: Good location
text: Small room but Great for what we needed, beds were comfortable and clean. Breakfast finished early at 9 and can be a bit chaotic if you arrive late and there's no cutlery to spread butter or jam on your croissant so bring one with you.

title: Failure to return deposits
text: Warning to potential patrons the hotel takes a $200 dollar deposit It has been 4 weeks since our visit and the deposit has still not been returned, I have emailed them twice with no reply. Our friends who stayed at the same time have still not received their deposit.  It is short practice at its best,

title: Perfect!
text: Everything about this hotel was perfect. The location was wonderful. The staff was friendly and helpful, especially Francesca and Quelwin. The room was clean and well appointed. The bed was comfortable. We were on the 4th floor and were worried about the street noise but just turning on the fan on the heater solved that problem. The grab and go breakfast had the freshest, most delicious pastries along with fruit, juice, coffee and tea. Will definitely stay here again!

title: Citrine Connect -perfect boutique hotel
text: This is a very nice  boutique hotel, well located in mid-town Manhattan. Quiet, without street noise; friendly staff; small but well-designed room. Room rates were ok and this is a good value. A winner!

title: Exactly what you need in NYC.
text: It’s exactly what we want in a hotel…clean, minimal, comfy bed, ease. It’s a slim building but it doesn’t feel cramped. The location is great if you want to be in walking distance of the theater district and Times Square. Tons of food choices from fast food to pubs to fine dining on the block, A free continental breakfast and drinks/snacks available and easily charged to your room is a perk. Fridges are available for $15 a day. All the necessary things like free WiFi, tv, hairdryer and iron. We would totally stay here again!

title: Hôtel bien placé
text:
Le rapport parfait pour NYC
Idéalement placé, hôtel très propres, chambres spacieuses.

Personnels sympa et de bon conseils …

Je recommande cet hôtel idéal pour visiter la ville à un prix accessible. 

+++ pour la proximité ( metro a deux pas, Times Square…)

title: Situation géographique idéale
text:
Hôtel idéalement placé, au cœur de New York! 
Chambre tout à fait convenable et propre, pas très grande, mais comme souvent en ville.
Personnels très sympa et de bons conseils!
Petite collation le matin, avec boissons chaudes, fruits et viennoiseries, pas mal avant d’aller se balader, surtout si on se lève tôt.
Quartier autour de l’hôtel sympa, pas mal de restos, toutes les boutiques sont à quelques pas et le métro accessible facilement.
Vue très jolie dans la chambre depuis le 22eme étages.
Je recommande vivement pour une escapade à New York!!

title: TAXAS ABSURDAS DIFERENTE DO SIT
text:
Hotel fedido, apertado e o cafe da manha é ridiculo, melhor comer bagem na barraquinha!
O pior cobram US$ 10/mala para armazenar depois do check out ate vc sair definitivamente do hotel!
A taxa cobrada difere do site,  onde eles alegam que o site esta desatualizado!
Banheiro minusculo e chuveiro de gotas, e para completar  a tragedia nao tem armario, ou seja, fuja deste hotel!

title: Gutes Hotel für NYC
text:
Vorweg: Aufgrund der Reduzierung der AirBnB Angebote in Manhattan sind alle Hotels derzeit teurer.

Unabhängig davon hat dieses Hotel eine gute Lage in der 45th Ecke 5th Avenue. Zur Orientierung hilft zB der NBA Store.

3 Blocks weiter und man ist Mitten am TimesSquare. Wer es gemütlicher möchte, geht einfach 15 Blocks „hoch“ und ist am CentralPark.

Das Zimmer war für New Yorker Verhältnisse groß genug und sauber. Die Mitarbeiter waren ebenfalls immer freundlich und hilfsbereit.

Ich kann das Hotel auf jeden Fall empfehlen
Im Zimmer befand sich ein TV (mit allen wichtigen Sendern), Schreibtisch und Safe. Minibar zur Kühlung von Getränken fehlt, war für uns aber nicht wichtig. Das Bett war groß genug und gemütlich.

title: excelent
text: excelent atention , !!!very nice,the atention in the front desk was perfect , nos consiguieron el traslado al aerpuerto y guardaron nustro equipaje, la unica observacion la ducha salia aguanhacia afuera

title: Small rooms.
text: The rooms are tiny even for a family of four with two small kids. Although this is NYC for the price it was not good value. Very slow check in and out (which was really just a bag drop as we had done this on line). Good location. Overall I wouldn’t stay again because I think we can find a better hotel.

title: excellent location and value more than make-up for tiny room
text: Excellent location and a good value for NYC.  I was traveling with my sister and her two teenage kids and  although the room was small (even by NY standards), the location was excellent.  Comfy beds, good shower, quiet.  Also really appreciated their use of full-sized wall-mounted toiletries (C.D. Bigelow) in lieu of single use toiletries.

title: Simple but close to everything
text: Location, location, location. Simple, clean, everything we needed for a weekend where we spent as little time in the hotel as possible...because everything outside is what we're here for. Highly walkable to everything Times Square and Broadway, rooms clean if compact (18 foot to foot steps, end to end). Tight elevators and everyone trying to get to the continental breakfast (fruit, croissants, coffee) at the same time can be a bit annoying if the hotel is crowded, but it's really not a big deal. Staff was friendly, beds were comfortable, and price was the best we found for this close to the action.

title: Weekend getaway!
text: Super great location with plenty of taxis if needed and close to metro stops!  Great shower!  Great mattress!  Room on street side was acutally relatively quiet.  In-house continental breakfast a good option.  Fantastic staff!!!

title: Thanks David
text: Massive shout out to David, he really went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable and after a long journey to get to NYC I’m glad this is the hotel we chose. Couldn’t have a nicer person welcoming guests and gave great advice!!! Thanks mate

title: Excelente
text: Good location near Times Square and Grand Central , everything was ok and satisfied.  Attention was good and de hostesses were always available for the guess , important to mention there is water and microwave available .

title: Excelente ubicación mal servicio
text:
Estuvimos en septiembre, el check inn es si o si a las 15 hs si lo queres antes son uds 70, el desayuno es un desastre, media luna café en un termo, jugo, y fruta contada no reponen, mesa chica comunitaria donde no encontras lugar 
Después de esperar hasta las 15 nos dieron una habitación en un entrepiso donde estaba el cuarto de las mudamos que venían a las 8 y se ponían a charlar en voz alta 
La cama la hacen cada tres dias , nunca visto
Ahora la ubicación es excelente!

title: Upkeep and cleanliness could use work!
text: Although the staff was very helpful and friendly, the room itself left a lot to be desired. When I checked in and went to my room, I noticed the bed next to mine and a red substance dripping from the bed frame down to the floor. Fearing it could be blood, I called the front desk, who immediately dispatched housekeeping. Luckily, it appeared only to be nail polish. (How it got there is anyone’s guess) The sheets were also dirty and there was a lot of hair in the sheets. Combined with the lack of general upkeep, I was very uncomfortable. Couldn’t check out soon enough!

title: Small but clean and conveniently located with friendly staff
text: Hotel is decent, very small rooms, but overall clean. Good, affordable place to stay if you plan on doing a lot of site seeing. Located in a great spot not far from Time Square, Rockefeller Center and other tourist spots. David at the front desk is very hospitable and helpful.

title: AMAZING ANNIVERSARY
text: I loved this hotel so much. It’s super cute and the staff is amazing. It was really clean and spacious, more than I thought from the photos. Specifically, this one staff member from the front desk named David was super polite and helpful. I called about the WiFi password like a million times and he was always so nice and funny. 10/10 Would Recommend

title: Great hotel for solo trips!
text: I’ve enjoyed my stay here at the Citadines connect! Checking in was such a breeze and definitely received a warm welcome from David! He was great with my accommodations and even with helping me set up my ASR account!  He was also great with answering questions about navigating NY as this is my first trip ever! David was very nice, gave great service, and extremely helpful. 10/10 on the hospitality!

title: Excellent location
text: The hotel location is excellent. The staff is friendly and helpful. Grab-and-go breakfast is simple but good (croissant, cheese and juice). The rooms with two double beds are small but clean. I wish they had a refrigerator. Please, consider a room with a front view for better lighting and privacy. Also, note that there's an additional residence fee of $20 per day. Overall, I would definitely recommend this property.

title: Front Desk Agent
text: I recently had a wonderful experience with a front desk agent named David during my stay. His professionalism and attentiveness were exceptional throughout my stay. He efficiently handled check-in and promptly addressed any questions or concerns I had. His knowledge of the hotel and surrounding area was impressive. His customer service skills were top-notch, as he always went above and beyond to ensure my stay was great. I truly appreciated his friendly demeanor and willingness to assist me with any requests.

title: Ottima posizione, colazione buona, personale molto gentile.
text:
Posizione fantastica, piccola colazione ottima per chi è abituato al dolce la mattina, camera un po' piccola (ma nello standard di NYC), personale gentilissimo, pulizia migliorabile.
Ho già anticipato tutto, comunque si sta molto bene in questo hotel, a due passi da Times Square, praticamente sulla 5th in una  via ricca di bar e ristoranti. 
Colazione a base di ottime brioches, frutta, formaggio, ecc. Non la tipica colazione intercontinentale, come anticipato al check-in, ma ottima per noi italiani; caffè sempre disponibile.

Come detto, potrebbero pulire un po' meglio (per il nostro standard) ma comunque la camera è pulita e la biancheria profumata. 

Prezzo corretto rispetto a posizione e periodo: se dovessi tornare a NYC lo prenderei di nuovo in considerazione.

title: Enjoyable stay.
text: Great little room in the centre of midtown Manhattan  - Comfy and clean. Great price. Great location. Staff at front desk super friendly. I skipped breakfast here in favour of Starbucks just down the road.

title: Amazing
text: Excellent bedroom, fantastic bed. I had an incredible time at Citadines. This hotel is located in the best area of Manhattan, it's close to Empire State, Times Square, Central Park, etc. Easy to go to wherever you want.

title: Great choice
text:
The location is adeguated for visiting Manhattan.
The room is clean, the service is very good
Suggested!!
Good good 
New York is wonderful
The hotel is the best choice for family groups and breakfast is good!

title: Quick overnight trip
text: The hotel was the perfect spot for a quick trip. Had all the basics needed for our stay. Beds were comfortable, clean linens, staff were friendly and it was in a great location. My only complaint was that it could’ve been a bit cleaner in the shower. Other than that I’d definitely stay there again!

title: Un 10
text: Excelente opción para visitar Manhattan. Ubicación ideal en la esquina casi con la quinta avenida. Todo a mano para visitar sin gastar en transporte. Lugares baratos y buenos para comer cerca del hotel. La habitación es pequeña pero muy bien planeada con el mueble que hace de armario, ya que no quita espacio. El baño ideal con la ducha con mampara lo que es más higiénico. Es un hotel limpio con una cama enorme para dos personas. Te hacen la cama en dias alternos, pero no es problema con el edredón que tienen. Las toallas las cambian todas las mañanas y reponen lo que falte de jabón y otras cosas. No es un hotel lujoso pero con buen precio, limpio, tranquilo, bien insonorizado no oyes otras habitaciones, y por la noche no hay mucho tráfico, lo que te permite descansar. El desayuno no lo hemos hecho allí con lo cual no puedo opinar. En recepción todo lo que ocurría, como en nuestro caso la tele que no funcionaba, lo arreglaron. Fueron muy amables. Lo mismo el personal de limpieza que hacía muy bien su trabajo. Un fuerte abrazo para el personal que logró hacer el viaje más fácil y bonito. Volvería con los ojos cerrados de nuevo. Un 10

title: Completo disastro
text:
Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel per 4 giorni e oltre al pernottamento avevamo anche la colazione internazionale compresa. La colazione internazionale, è stata allestita nella hall dell' hotel e a causa della mancanza di posti a sedere ci siamo ritrovati spesso a consumarla in piedi inoltre per tutti i 4 giorni prevedeva soltanto cornetti, un succo, caffè, the, mozzarella Stick e solo per due giorni frutta (mele e banane). 
La camera relativamente piccola, non è mai stata sistemata in 4 giorni, nonostante avessimo lasciato all esterno il cartellino per farla riordinare ( l ultimo giorno stavano cambiando gli asciugamani alle 10 di sera). Ascensori sempre occupati e lenti. Unica nota positiva, la posizione, accanto a times square e alle principali attrazioni. Se potete cercate altro

title: Very nice
text: This hotel was amazing loved staying the night and Quelwin was great with his service gave us an amazing service 10/10 will come again when I can to nyc and stay at this same hotel.  -Mathias Morales

title: Perfect perfect perfect!!
text: David gave me great service, do not hesitate to stay here! Perfect location, super clean and Modern and lovely staff! I booked this hotel as a last minute as I ended up staying in NY longer than expected and it didn’t disappoint.

title: Comfortable, Clean and perfect location.
text: This hotel is located in the absolutely perfect place for shopping and theaters. Stayed here for 2 days with my mom to see some shows and enjoy the city. It was perfect for what we needed, which was a clean bed to sleep. It’s a small hotel but the staff were very friendly and accommodating. At check-in, David asked if I wanted to sign up as a member (no fee) to get a later check-out, early check-in and no charge for a mini fridge we needed for medication. It’s nothing extravagant, but we didn’t want or need that. Bathroom was clean and updated and we had all we needed for a very comfortable stay in a perfect area of the city.

title: A hotel worth recommending.
text: Very good location and friendly staff at the hotel during our entire stay at the hotel.  A modest room, but in a typical New York standard.  Breakfast in the grab and go version, not too big, but enough for a nice start to the day.  Overall a recommendable hotel and we will definitely consider staying there on our next visit to NYC.

title: la mejor ubicación posible
text:
Nos encantó este hotel. Su ubicación es privilegiada. Está cerca de todos los lugares de interés en Midtown (Rockefeller Center, Times Square, Grand Central, Bryant Park, etc). Tiene todo lo necesario para tener una estancia amena. Sus camas son muy cómodas y la habitación tenía todo lo necesario. 

El desayuno es "Grab & go" por o que el café, croissant, queso, fruta y jugo son muy buenos para salir corriendo a disfrutar de la ciudad.

title: Posizione Top!
text: Abbiamo soggiornato in questo hotel in Luglio 2023, ci è stata assegnata una stanza al secondo piano. Sicuramente il vero punto di forza dell'Hotel è la posizione tra la 5 Avenue e la 45th Strada. Ottima anche la camera il letto, arredamento moderno, niente moquette, letto comodissimo, aria condizionata efficiente. Carino il bagno, di cui segnalo un'ottima doccia (pressione e temperatura acqua). Mancava il phon che ci è stato fornito in reception, non era presente il frigo. Non mi è piaciuto il blocco alla finestra che consentiva una limitata apertura della finestra. La colazione era gratuita ma le dimensioni della hall (zona in cui viene servita) non consentono di fare colazione nella hall se non alle 7.30-8.00 del mattino per l'affollamento che si crea. La colazione era minimale ma l'ho apprezzata, il croissant era buono e anche la pasta alla marmellata, avrei gradito anche uno yogurt e un distributore di acqua fredda.

title: No dan servicio alguno.
text:
En una semana alojadas en este hotel tan solo nos han hecho la cama UNA SOLA VEZ . Di aviso en recepción y no hicieron nada. 
También dije por favor que rellenarán los jabones de la ducha y tampoco nos han hecho caso.  El desayuno era: basket de croissants y zumos de naranja de brick. Cafe y ni siquiera leche. Tan solo condimentos asquerosos sustitutivos de leche. No hemos desayunado ni un solo día ahí de lo asqueroso que era. 
Lo único positivo ha sido: 
El staff era muy educado y amable (a pesar de que no se cumplieran los requisitos de la habitación). Y que la location era perfecta. Cerca de todo. 

Desgraciadamente no aconsejo este hotel si se quiere tener un mínimo de servicios

title: Great experience
text:
The hotel location is great, only 2 streets walk from Times Square.
The room is wide and provided with all the facilities and it was super clean.
The breakfast was very nice and delicious and the bakery was very fresh and tasty.
The staff were very friendly and helpful.

title: Excellent clean hotel in heart of the city
text:
Great hotel to use as a base. Rooms are smaller than photos but given we just wanted to sleep it wasn’t an issue.
Rooms were cleaned and beds made daily, comfy queen (USA) size beds, shower over bath was super powerful, well stocked hangers, towels, pillows, slippers and iron. Quiet hotel and we stayed on 5th floor- no issues with elevator. Air conditioning was a godsend. 
Grab and go breakfast was just what we needed. We got a complimentary late checkout for 12 and paid  5dollars to store luggage for the afternoon. The guys on the desk were super friendly and helpful.
I would def stay here again and totally recommend. It’s also very central we are talking 5 mins Times Square, Broadway, Grand Central

title: Bra hotell i perfekt läge.
text: Ett trevligt hotell med ett perfekt läge, strax söder om Central Park. Känns som det är nära till allt. Mindre rum med sköna sängar och bra badrum. Frukosten äts i foajén eller tas med. Den består av croissanter, juice, frukt, kaffe och te. Trevlig personal.

title: Amazing hotel in Manhattan!!
text: Room was super clean and modern. Beds and pillows were very comfortable. Grab and go breakfast was perfect in the morning. Staff was friendly & professional. Amazing location in NYC! We loved our stay

title: Perfect
text:
Staff is friendly, nice and helpful.
Room are clean, mattress is comfortable.
Bathroom is small,  but with a modern big shower and with everything you need.
I like the grab and go breakfast .
Super location.

title: Hotel Citadines Connect New York
text: Letto matrimoniale piccolo (anche in lunghezza) assenza totale di armadio solo 5 appendiabiti (abbiamo lasciato i vestiti nelle valigie per tutto il soggiorno) colazione internazionale molto scarsa. Posizione e pulizia ottime. Personale alla reception sempre diverso, alcuni disponibili altri meno, in  perfetto stile newyorkese. Per il costo/persona mi aspettavo di più anche se la categoria è 3 stelle. Valido ma migliorabile

title: My New Go-To
text: This is my third stay here and for a NY hotel near Bryant Park and Times Square, my 18th floor Inside room is perfect… except for a missing tissue box. Quiet, cozy, comfortable and clean along with safety makes this a hidden oasis as New York deals with trash bags, street parties in front of the closed mini park down the block and damn $8 per minute musical pedicabs.

title: Good location
text: Simple, clean accommodations in a good area. Parking is available two blocks away, an easy walk back to the hotel. Has all the basics and is within walking distance of good restaurants and sightseeing places. Online check in and check out were easy and expedited entry and departure.

title: Excellent location, value, cleanliness & customer service
text:
I chose this hotel based on it's location in NYC and particularly it's convenient proximity to Grand Central Terminal and Grand Central Madison. It's an easy trip from the hotel to Grand Central and the new service from Grand Central Madison to JFK via the LIRR, made this hotel a terrific choice. 

The Citadine's central location also makes it an easy walk to some of NYC's finest sightseeing and shopping spots.

The staff was friendly, the hotel room was immaculate and quiet. Breakfast was available though I missed it.

title: Perfect location and Clean, breakfast can improve in variations.
text: Location is perfect. Hotel was super clean. The only thing I have to comment is the grab and go breakfast do not have any variations, it is the same everyday for the term of our stay (5days). So in conclusion very good hotel if you want to explore NY.

title: Melhor custo benefício de Nova Iorque!
Muy bueno
text: Excelente ubicación. Habitaciones pequeñas pero están perfectas para descansar y pasar el día explorando la ciudad. Volvería a hospedarme en este lugar. El desayuno no es el más variado, pero realmente está bien para comenzar el día, café, croissant y alguna fruta

title: Great location and nice rooms
text: This hotel has a great price for value. Great location close to 5th Avenue and Times Square. Rooms are with parquet and not moquette and I loved it. My was silent respect to the outside road and it was great, but it wasn’t so silent inside I could hear all the around noise of the floor. I liked even the free breakfast , it has only some dessert and beverages but for me was perfect to start the day. I will come back.

title: Great experience
text: The Citidines was a quaint hotel in a great location. The staff was exceptional. The room was very clean, as was the rest of the hotel. Breakfast consisted of pastries , fruit, coffee and juice, as advertised. I highly recommend this for your stay if you are looking for an economical option.

title: Good location, bad overall experience
text:
We were only a block and a half from Times Square, which was nice.  But I really did not expect such a disappointing overall experience.  Many of the other reviews made it seem like a good deal but I feel like it was overpriced considering the shoddy experience.  I honestly couldn't wait to get back home, which is not normal for a short vacation.

Negatives:

Tiny room (as bad as many small cruise ship rooms).
Injured my hand because of how the door opens right up to the wall.
Other guests fighting, yelling, and slamming doors in the middle of the night.
No "do not disturb" sign; never received one after requesting at the front desk.
Body wash ran out and was never refilled.
Uncomfortable beds and a horrible window view.
Paltry continental breakfast that ends way too early.
Not nearly enough drawer space for multiple people.
Only one Keurig caffeinated coffee pod the whole time.
Too pricey for all these negatives.

Positives:

Check-in and check-out were easy.
Shower was decent.
Room attendants were friendly.
The (very few) items with the continental breakfast tasted fine.
The television was decent, although no channel guides.
Very nice location, which is about the only good reason to stay here.

title: Great location for a short stay!
text:
Rooms were clean and well furnished. It was exactly what we needed for our stay in New York. 

The only 'miss' would be the breakfast which is very simple, but that is a minor detail. 

A big thank you to Francesca for her precious help and kindness.

title: Very very nice experience, perfect location in the city
text: The stay in your hotel was very nice. All the team at the reception is very very nice and helpful if we need any help. The employees are very nice and ready to help if needed. The location is perfect for visiting all around

title: Wonderful
text:
It was an unforgettable experience, wonderful city, I was delighted in all aspects, see you soon New York.

In a new opportunity with more calm and time, I want to know places that it was not possible to visit.

title: Best stay
text: I had a great time at this hotel. The staff was friendly and helpful. The hotel was super clean and nice. The location is great because it’s close to so many things and the area was very nice. It was really great.

title: Awesome Service!
text:
The customer service was phenomenal! They were very flexible and ready to accommodate last minute requests. We needed specific room conditions and they had the room set up and ready for us.
Will definitely come back and highly recommended.

title: SI Y NO
text: !Cosas buenas: Ubicación excelente y camas  comodisimas. Cosas regulares: Habitación pequeña (aunque para una escapada de varios días está bien ). Vistas horrendas ( realmente no vas a NY a mirar por la ventana, así que no importa).Cosas malas: El desayuno!! Estuvimos tres noches y el mismo desayuno todos los días ….misma bollería (un poco dura), mandarinas y manzanas  . Si tuvieran un tostador, el problema de la bollería dura se solucionaba … pero no!! Vamos, que si vas una semana prepárate para desayunar EXACTAMENTE LO MISMO los 7 días . Y ahora viene lo que en mi opinión no tiene nombre ….. NO OFRECEN NI AGUA POTABLE PSRA DESAYUNAR . Tienen ahí puestas unas botellitas de agua por las que te cobran casi 4$. Cuando les pregunté si me podían dar un vaso de agua me indicaron que había agua de grifo en el baño!!! Mi cara debió ser un poema . Que les costaría poner unas jarritas de agua en el centro de las mesas, como hacen en cualquier restaurante allí? Pero claro… la idea es vender …. Me parece un detalle muy feo . Resumiendo y teniendo en cuanta lo bueno y lo malo …. La próxima vez buscaremos otro hotel 🤷🏻‍♀️

title: Buena experiencia
text: Excelente estadía  junto a mi familia. Habilitacion limpia. Cambiaron toallas todos los días! Desayuno poco variado pero cumple con lo necesario. Café todo el día lo que se agradece. Personal muy amable. Lo único malo muy poco espacio para equipaje, éramos 4 persona y se hace pequeño.

title: Best Experience!
text: A beautiful stay, such a convenient place close to a lot of landmarks in NY. The hotel was generally okay. The service was amazing the lady named Francesca made our stay there worthwhile with her outstanding service. Will book with then again.

title: Amazing Front desk Francesca Gamboa!! Thank you.
text:
Very professional and friendly front desk Francesca greeted us. She  is very welcoming and the warmth that we felt upon checking in was so amazing!
Food delivered in our room was very nice quick and delicious.Thank you Francesca! You are wonderful.
So happy to have selected this hotel !👍👍

title: Great location, very good overall
text: They have Comfy beds and pillows, it was  good stay, a little pricey because it was a holiday. The room was smaller than expected, but it’s NYC, so it was ok. The location is perfect, close to everything

title: Two room delight
text: The two room units were great for a family to have some space to stretch out in when we needed a break from the city. The rooms were clean and quite.  The elevators were fast and rarely had to wait on them. I would book again!

title: Hard to beat
text:
An excellent stay. Clean, top location, nice amenities,great tv and internet.
Room is good size, and bed is super comfortable. There is a free croissant and coffe available in the morning. Starbucks is directly opposite

title: Best Value in Heart of Midtown
text: Great experience overall and recommend this seemingly Budget Hotel. The price was great though the amenities were well beyond expectations. Staff was incredibly friendly and helpful. And it included breakfast in the cute Lobby! The room was larger than I thought. There were lots of pillows and the towels were very soft. Wi-Fi was super fast at over 200 Mbps. I will stay here again. Thanks for the hospitality.

title: Very Comfortable Stay
text: After walking and seeing the city all day, it was so nice to crash here at night. The decor is cute and nicely done and the beds were very comfortable and clean. Everywhere was clean. When I first walk in a hotel room, that's the first thing I do, is check around if it seems clean. It it was. It was super close to Times Square and 5th Ave. We could easily walk to the places we were hoping to see from here.

title: Best thing about this hotel is the location and the comfortable beds
text:
I chose the Citadines based on both decent reviews and it's marvelous location. Upon arrival around 5 PM on a Thursday, there were roughly 4-5 parties waiting in the narrow hallway for an elevator (there are 2).  They waited and waited...when a door would open, the elevator was full of staff and things like laundry, they didn't get out so the line got longer.  Due to this, we requested a low floor figuring we'd use the stairs.  The only available was the Lower Level.  Fine.  The staff allowed us to use the stairs and go through an "employee only" area to access our room.  So we took the stairs down to the basement to what we somewhat affectionately dubbed "the Dungeon".  The room was small as is the norm in NYC, but adequate.  The lighting however was not, particularly in a room that gets almost no natural light.  The AC/Heat unit is in front of the window, and being in the basement the window was a bit high.  At 5'4", I basically had to be on tiptoe to open the blinds.  
The bed was very comfortable, the internet connected fine, the bathroom was adequate but not stocked well.  Everything was clean and in fact the room smelled of disinfectant.
The issue with the room is that it was across the hall from a staff office and we could hear conversations at all hours.
The lobby was comfortable and had a small food pantry for snacks.
There was nothing "wrong" with anything during our stay, but it felt impersonal; maybe it was the lower level space. You can't beat the location though!

title: Great experience!
text: It makes you fell like home! Vozy and peaceful hotel. Located at Diamond District, this hotel provides easy access to a variety of attractions around Broadway, Time Square, 5th Avenue, etc; as well close to public transportation.

title: After 12 years it's like my Manhattan home.
text:
I been staying at this establishment since 2011. My agent introduced me to it and I keep coming back. 

First of all the location, 45th & 5th Av, you cant beat this location. I like to walk in Manhattan (Manhattan is for walking) and got to know all parts of the city - You cant beat this location. Every hour of the day you can find action around Times Square. I was walking thru Times Square during all hours of the day. The location is also a perfect central position wherever you wanna go: downtown, central park, broadway, upper east upper west.

Secondly the rooms are nice clean and comfortable. They are not too big but most rooms in Manhattan are small. Rooms are fine for 2 persons and very fine for one person. You get a desk and a chair but no closet. There are some hangers to hang clothes.

Third Francesca Gamboa, I was lucky to have her as the receptionist upon my arrival. Friendly, smiling, informative.

They have a kind of Continental breakfast starting at 06:00; coffee, orange juice, danishes, croissants, bananas. They have a big table at the lobby you can all sit around + some places by the big window. The pics enclosed of the breakfast were taken at 06:00. I was the first guest after a 2 hour walk I took starting at 04:00 AM. I saw NY going to sleep and waking up. In Manhattan you have to make the most of every minute.

I would recommend to put mirrors at the elevators so you can look at yourself before heading out to the city.

I also recommended for them to put a scale for people to weigh their luggage before heading to the airport.

I would also recommend for the hotel to establish a fixed discount if you waive room service during stays of more than 1 night. Many dont need room service every day and it saves the hotel lots of money so why not pass part of those savings to the patrons?

Put a banner - Save the planet and save Money, If you waive room service we discount you lets say a 15$ a day. So if you stay lets say 7 nights, hotel gives you back 105$ and they only service your room upon your check-out. What about giving restaurant coupons as a discount? Restaurants mught give it to hotels for almost free to get a flow of clients. 

Manhattan is amzing. It's my 32nd visit starting in 1986. Some things change (in 1986 a metro rise was 25c, now it's 2.75$) but Mnhattan is always exciting. Every street and every avenue is a new adventure. 

This hotel is probably one of the best bases while visiting Manhattan and exploring all those adventures. 

Come, stay, wake up early, and see all that this city has to offer.

title: The most perfect place to stay in New York City
text: Citadines is the perfect stay in Manhattan for either worktrips or vacation! Last year I stayed at Citadines for 5 weeks with my sister while we were working from the hotel. The rooms have everything you need and is so clean, specious and modern! This year I came back and loved our stay again! The staff is so nice and makes you feel so welcome! We love them all. I will definitely come back every year as we loved it so so much! Thank you for always making our stay in the city the best!

title: Great long stay type hotel at a terrific price
text: Citadines is a centrally located (45th between 5th Ave & 6th Ave) in a great area.  It is a functional, long stay type hotel but with all the basic amenities you need—clean room, decent bathroom and continental breakfast.  Francesca, the front desk manager, is incredibly helpful.  For the price point, it is much better than the other chain hotels which are all along Port Authority in a not very nice part of town.

title: 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
text:
❤️👍🏽👍🏽 รีวิว โรงแรมที่มาพัก ที่นิวยอร์ก

อยากรีวิว เพราะพนักงานน่ารัก 
แล้วก็อยู่ใกล้ time square มากกกก เดินแค่ 5 นาทีถึง 😂 ใกล้บาร์ที่ติดท็อป 10 ของนิวยอร์ก

ใกล้ร้านอาหารไทย ชื่อร้าน Mitr Thai restaurant 
ที่อร่อยมากกกกกก ราคาก็ถือว่าไม่แพงมาก 

แถมเป็น Amimal friendly สัตว์เลี้ยงพักได้ 
พนักงาน น่ารัก ดูแลดีมาก สำหรับโรงแรมเล็กๆ
สรุป ประทับใจมาก มีโอกาศจะกลับมาอีกแน่นอนค่ะ ❤️
CItadines connect fifth avenue New York.

title: Excellent experience
text: We were 2 friends with my friends 2 grandchildren. Room, immaculate, beds, pillows, comfortable location, cant be beat, staff, exceptional. Great restaurants on the same street. We saw some grumpy reviews ~ you just can't please some people who want $500 amenities for under $150, get over it.  Will stay again and again.

title: Great location, super clean and nice
text: Typical small hotel room for NYC.  Very clean and the beds were comfortable and it was quiet.  Great location for theaters! The staff was very nice.  Don't like that we had to pay $20 for an early check in but a minor issue.

title: Wonderful place
text: The rooms are clean. The area is safe.  The hotel is quiet. I love it here.   This is the only hotel we stay in when in New York. The staff are friendly.  It is in a very good location-quick walk to many places.

title: Weekend overnight
text: Comfortable room with double beds, lots of pillows, cute modern bathroom and pleasant staff.  Excellent location from GCT.  The entire hotel was clean, no smell, and the elevators were fast.  Check-in was good but there was a small delay in getting our keys.  We did not have the breakfast, but there was a Starbucks across the street.

title: Great time
text:
Thank you for an amazing time in New York City, we found the place exactly as we saw on the website, the staff always was willing to help, the room was clean and nice. 
Taking care of our luggage was really a great idea. 
We definitely will be come here soon l

title: Catastrophique !
text: Cette hôtel est tout simplement catastrophique, les chambres sont très sales, certaine chambre sont en sous sol très humide ! Peu de lumière , Il fait très froid , la ventilation du chauffage est extrêmement bruyante ! Les chambres ne sont pas nettoyer ! Je ne comprends pas les avis positifs, seul, l’emplacement était très bon, c’est bien le pire hôtel de ma vie ! Concernant le petit déjeuner, il est inexistant ! Il n’y a pas de chauffage dans la salle de bain. Nous ne sommes pas des gens difficile. Mais c’est bien la pire aventure que nous ayons vécu dans cette hôtel. Même gratuit, je ne mettrai plus jamais les pieds.

title: False advertising read fine print! Charged for breakfast and WiFi.
text:
One of the reasons I booked this hotel was because it stated on the reservation details for your hotel “breakfast included” and “free WiFi”. The attendant on duty at the front desk at check in stated I needed to agree to an additional “residence fee.” She stated this fee included WiFi with included breakfast. Why is the booking stating free WiFi and breakfast
if I’m getting charged over $20 for both amenities? She stated it’s in the long fine print I agreed to upon book. Sneaky and bad and this is misleading and false advertising for customers.

title: GREAT LOCATION AND ROOM
text: Great location in midtown, It was efficient to all necessities in the city. Room was sufficient to needs. It was clean and the service at front desk helped get us checked in quickly. Very friendly and clean.

title: Very disappointing
text: Arrived to find our 2 rooms we booked 9 months ago weren't available so they had to move us elsewhere for the first night. This took 3 hrs to sort and we were told 3 different stories by members of staff who were blatantly lying they'd overbooked and we met another family the following day who had the exact same thing happen. Not what you need when you've just travelled for 20 hrs with an autistic child and partially sighted adult. I had to be very firm that i wasnt paying for taxis to the next hotel as it was their error and they needed to sort it. Eventually after several phonecalls for permission they agreed if we kept receipts they would reimburse us. I feel this was the least they could do and shouldn't have even been an issue. Rooms were very small I will say clean. However we had no room service for our 4 night stay bins weren't emptied no clean towels provided. There was a trolley permanently sat outside our room 24/7 so we just helped ourselves I'm not sure if that's the general idea as the other half of our party on a different floor had the same. The breakfast is very basic coffee, orange juice, croissant jam and apples.theres one communal table so if more than 2 families eat at the same time prepare to stand. We actually wish we'd stayed at the first property they put us in but we thought a smaller boutique hotel would be more personal than a big chain. We were wrong! They did offer to remove some of our resort fees for the inconvenience when we checked out this wasn't the case and nobody was around to override the system. So we paid the full amount and the lady said I would get an email and refund when the shift manager arrived well that was 4am thurs and so far nothing. Only positive was the location wouldn't recommend.

title: Location, location, location
text: Simple but comfortable hotel in a very convenient spot! The staff is friendly and helpful, and the beds comfy. The room I got was small but served my needs well. The included breakfast was just fine--coffee, pastries and fruit--but the real draw of this hotel is the location. It is so close to the NY Public Library, Broadway theatres, Rockefeller Center, Bryant Park and much more.

title: Will definitely stay here again....
text:
Loved this hotel. We had two rooms as travelling with teenagers. Fab location, close to everything. Rooms were great, no issues. Breakfast was grab & go, which suited us, although we went out for breakfast on a couple of days. Would definitely stay here again.

Our only gripe were the room doors slamming. They are on hinges, so they close automatically. I get it's for fire safety, but people would just let them slam, very annoying and very loud late at night and early morning.
The hotel arranged transport for us back to the airport on leaving, it was very easy and they were always very helpful.

I left my Beats headphones in the room when checking out and didn't realise until we were through security at the airport. We were flying home to the UK. I emailed the hotel straight away and they said they would keep them safe. I arranged for my flight attendant friend to collect them 4wks later when he flew to NY. They kept them safe, great service. We will probably stay here again when we return to NY.

title: Unsafe for female travelers alone, do not stay here
text:
There were a number of turn-offs about this hotel. For example, running check-in like a cheap airline-- late checkout? That will be $20. A room with a nicer view? Another $10-20 a day. Want to leave a bag at the desk after checkout? $5 per bag. The nickel-and-diming is tacky, especially since the price, while cheaper than some (better) hotels in the area, is still significant.

However, the reason for my one star, and why I considered leaving almost immediately after check-in: After checking in, I got in the elevator to go to my room, and there was a maintenance man in there with me. He made a flirtatious comment towards me, which made me very uncomfortable (Not me misinterpreting, either-- it was a very blatant come-on) and when I got to my floor, he held the elevator door open and stuck his head out to watch what room I was going to.

I felt like panicking but I tried to just get in as soon as I could. He said something like, "Want me to come and help open your door?" and I said "No, I'm fine" and he kept insisting, saying he could help me get into my room. In light of the flirtatious comment, and that I am a woman alone with this man, I was feeling super unsafe that this man not only stopped the elevator to watch me go to my room, but was now insisting he come to my door. I was super flustered and repeated I was fine, got into my room, and immediately bolted the door.

If I had been traveling alone, I would have probably left. Fortunately my male friend was coming to meet me and stay with me. And thank goodness, too, because guess who came by at 7:30 PM, knocking at my door? My male friend answered the door and the same maintenance man asked if I needed "extra towels?" He did not knock on anyone else's door in the entire hallway, only mine, and at 7:30 PM?
DO NOT STAY HERE IF YOU ARE A FEMALE TRAVELING ALONE. In fact, do not stay here at all.

title: Very clean; Centrally located to Broadway/Times Square
text: I booked this hotel based on reviews off of Trip Advisor and it was perfect for our weekend getaway. Close to everything; we walked everywhere. Rooms are small, but super clean with a modernized look. Bathroom was perfect, also super clean, no mold, plenty of room to move around in. I will book here again.

title: Muy bien ubicado
text: Súper bien ubicado, limpio, el cuarto muy pequeño, éramos 4, nos dieron la habitación hasta las 5, la gente muy amable, no tuvimos oportunidad de tomar el desayuno, nada más es de 6 a 9. El espacio de la recepción es chico pero acogedor , todo bien

title: Perfect for a couple, family and dogs
text: Very good localisation. We had the suite and it was perfect for 2 adults ans 2 kids. It was my fourth time and my two littles dogs are always there. The breakfast is better than before (now : orange juice, apple, croissants, coffee).

title: Anche no
text: Personale poco gentile, richiesto camera piccola ma ci è stata assegnata una stanza nel piano seminterrato vicino ai locali dello staff. Posizione centrale ma in una zona veramente troppo caotica. Ci sono posti sicuramente migliori di questo allo stesso prezzo.

title: Excellent stay
text: A+++ the staff was extremely courteous and helpful. Did not have long wait times on the elevator (like some reviews said) room was clean and comfortable for our family of 4.. and the best part about this hotel is the LOCATION!! So close to everything. We said multiple times this trip that I would stay in the same hotel next visit.

title: Did not honor our reservation
text: Just an awful experience. We had reservations to stay on 12/17-12/19. We arrived, checked-in, and went to lunch. 30 mins later, we received a text telling us the hotel was oversold and that the hotel was moving us to a “sister hotel” 12 blocks away. An inferior hotel 12 blocks away from all of our reservations. Just kicked us out. Didn’t even offer to pay for our ride. Even when we got to the new hotel, they didn’t have a room with two beds. We had to work that out on our own. To be fair, the front desk folks were incredibly apologetic and professional about telling us this absurd news. But, just be wary, reservations mean nothing at this hotel. Stay away.

title: Alex is the best there is in this industry!!!!!
text: Alex was by far the sweetest receptionist I have ever interacted with. He took such good care of all my coworkers and I. He was kind, energetic, and truly a caring person. He was the one who truly made this trip unforgettable. The hotel was great and all, but in the end he made our company trip the best. Alex is by far the kind of worker everyone should be striving to hire.

title: Christmas/Birthday in Times Square
text: The location is perfect if you are looking to be in the heart of absolutely everything. Breakfast was simple and quick a good way to start the day. The staff are all amazing but our thanks goes to Chris for making us so welcome and making sure we had the best time in New York in spite of the many checkins they have each day.

title: Wonderful location
text: Great hotel. Modern, clean and comfortable. The staff were always available and always super friendly and helpful. Location wise, it was on a quiet street while being within short walking distance to Time Square and lots of other popular places. Couldn’t have chosen a better hotel for our trip.

title: Like a guest room!
text:
Clean and comfortable - it’s not a fancy hotel. Our room was like sleeping in someone’s guest room with a private bath. But it was clean comfortable and the staff was friendly and attentive
Perfect for what we were looking for!  
Good coffee too!

title: Fabulous Alex ♥️♥️
text:
As soon as we walked in we were greeted with a big smile
From Alex on reception he actually made our stay such a lovely lovely person !!! He made you feel like you were his best friend , such a credit to the hotel !!! Love him!!! The hotel is in a great location, very clean and just perfect !! I would highly recommend

title: Great!
text: Alex is the best! He was very helpful getting us checked in and offered amazing recommendations for places to eat and drink. We loved chatting with him and felt like he became a part of our family!!!!

title: Kurztripp nach New York (3 Nöchte)
text: Sehr Zentral gelegenes Hotel: Time square, Rockefeller Centre, 5th Avenue, Macy’s, Central Park. Die Zimmer sind sauber, man hat alles was man braucht, wir hatten das Zimmer 1802 im 18 Stock nach hinten gelegen. Das Frühstück mit Orangensaft, süßem Gebäck, Kaffee oder Tee kann auch mit genommen werden. Netter Empfang.

title: NYC
text: The hotel was so clean and comfortable. The bed was also really nice and cozy! The location of this place was superb as it was central to just about everything. And the most exceptional customer service you could ask for. Alex at the front desk exceeded my expectations and made my stay beyond enjoyable! I would definitely return to this place.

title: Great People, Great Location
text: From the moment I walked into the lobby I was welcomed by Alex. He was friendly and really went above and beyond helping me check in. I arrived a couple hours before check in, Alex helped me check in my bag so I could continue to work but not before explaining all amenities and offering a bottle of water. I had a very early morning flight so I was very tired and having Alex help me was a great relief and brightened my mood. My room was clean and ready at check in time, the bed was great for a quick nap and the fact that they have a continental breakfast in NYC is great! Overall a very positive experience and look forward to returning.

title: Location is about all that was good
text: Worst bed I have ever slept in (comfort & size); when they say "double bed", it is that - and not a queen size bed.  Second smallest hotel room I have ever stayed in (Oddly, the smallest was also in Midtown Manhattan; go figure!).  Extremely limited space to store clothes, hang coats, and put away one's belongings.  Breakfast selection was meager (croissants; 2 types of danish; apples; OJ/Coffee/Tea; that's all, folks!).  Parking was an inconvenience.  Not enough coffee packets were available in the room.  Value was not met (I will give this a pass, given it was Thanksgiving weekend.).  In-room safe provided.  Shower functioned well (although I had to clear the drain of hair blockage).  Good note:  The staff was very pleasant.  Also:  Central location in Midtown was a plus.

title: Excelente personal en especial Alex, recomendadoo
text: Excellent attention from all its staff, especially the young alex, the hotel super comfortable good breakfast, super comfortable beds and excellent cleanliness recommended, Easy arrival and departure access I felt at home

title: Excelente localização e preço justo . Equipe atenciosa e capacitado .
text:
Excelente localização e equipe amorosa e muito educada . Em especial para Francesca que fez uma excelente recepção e acolhimento. Ter um café da manga básico incluído em NYC também é outra vantagem.
Quartos limpos , impecáveis e confortáveis .

title: Situation idéale , mais déception au niveau de la taille de la chambre.
text:
Déçue car les photos des chambres sont pas tout à fait comme dans la réalité. 
Chambre très petite. 
Déçue de la literie. 

Très peu de rangements. 

Chambre faite uniquement au niveau des sanitaires et les lits ont été fait une seule fois sur la durée du séjour de 5 nuits. 

Peu de place pour le petit déjeuner.

title: Great staff
text:
I arrived in the evening and Michael had to tell a customer that they were over booked. Not an easy task, but he handled it super well and I was very impressed with his customer service abilities. 
The next morning Francesca helped me check out and print out some materials for work. She is very delightful and is also great at customer service.  Thank you Michael and Francesca for making my stay great!

title: Weekend Gate-away/Francesca’s Review
text: Francesca was soooo sweet. She was very helpful and kind to our whole group. She guided us to places that we were not quite sure of as location wise. She radiated a positive energy and was very welcoming.

title: Weekend Getaway
text: Front office staff was incredibly helpful in answering all our questions. Francesca went above and connected to local restaurants. She was very inviting and friendly. The staff was accommodating to our needs.

title: Weekend getaway
text: Francesca was amazing! She was so helpful in finding places for us to go out and local places. Everyone was very accommodating to our needs. Definitely recommend staying here if you’re looking for a place close to everything!

title: Top Lage und saubere Zimmer
text:
Das Hotel liegt super zentral, alle wichtigen U-Bahnen in der Nähe, der Fahrradverleih City Bikes ist gleich um die Ecke, Restaurants und Cafés gut zu Fuß erreichbar.
Das Zimmer war sehr sauber. Das Personal war sehr nett. Vor allem Francesca! Sie hatte alles im Griff (es gab erst Probleme mit unserer Buchung), hat sich unsere Namen und Zimmernummern gleich gemerkt und uns immer toll geholfen! Und alles mit einem wunderschönen Lächeln☺️
Einzige Cons: auch in unserem Zimmer hörten wir den wahnsinnigen New York Lärm durch die dünnen Fenster. Und das Frühstück findet in der Lobby statt, teilweise war es so voll, dass keine Sitzplätze mehr gab. Und es war dann auch sehr laut. Kein Platz für ein ausgedehntes, gemütliches Frühstück also.

title: Avoid this dump
text: If you spend more than $75/ni here you got scammed by a crappy motel. Nothing was good. ADA was a lie, room sucked, breakfast was terrible. I don't know what else to say to fill up 200 characters other than don't ever stay here. It's an overpriced hostel.

title: Comfy and good Vibes
text: Alex was a great help! Super friendly and amazing service. Hotel was super cozy and had good vibes all around. Be sure to sign up for their membership program to reap the benefits at check-in/check-out!

title: A very relaxed and amazing Stay in New York
text: I spend 10 Days in New York with a good friend of mine and the Citadines Connect i must say was the perfect place to do so. The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom spacious (for NY) and a very pleasant addition to our everyday life was the to go breakfast, which really was a great start to each day. The room also was very quiet, clean and the location of the hotel very convenient. The only downside to our experience would be the missing wardrobe in the room, which meant we had to live out of our suitcases the entire time. But i would absolutely recommend this hotel and come back gladly :)

title: UN HOTEL SERVICIAL
text:
Atención maravillosa permanente, ubicación envidiable entre Central Park y Rockefeller Center, entre la 5ta y la 6ta, habitaciones agradables, precio asequible. Lo hago mío!

Cercano a lugares y espacios maravillosos y muy fácil para movilizarse.

title: Great location, great staff (Alex <3)
text: I have been coming to this hotel for awhile in my periodic trips to NYC. The location cannot be beat. It’s also clean and modern and priced ok in a city where hotels really can break the bank. In this last stay, supervisor Alex really went the extra mile for us. We missed breakfast (jet lag will kill you every time) and when he saw, he gave us breakfast baggies. He also allowed us to check out a bit late. All of it with a wonderful smile and lovely attitude, what a jewel! I strongly recommend this hotel 😊

title: 45th-5th Ave Location. Clean and comfy rooms. Highly recommending this hotel!
text:
Strategically located at midtown manhattan with a walking distance to Times Square, broadway and the shopping district at 5th Avenue. There is a nearby cafe few steps from the hotel that serves hot and fresh meals. Starbucks and wendys across the street as well. The room is relatively small but it has everything that we need: comfy bed and clean room. Also, fast and smooth check in process with friendly and reliable staff. 
You'd know you booked the right hotel when you'd want to come back and book it the next time! Definitely recommending this place.

title: They called the police
text:
Rooms are extremely small without any place where to put your stuff.
Breakfast and reception are in the same small area and there is not enough place to seat.
Not a lot of options for breakfast too.
During my staying (3 nights) unfortunately I had a bad experience. A guest of the hotel decided at 2:30am to scream from his room. The day after I spoke with the receptionist and he apologized about this but didn't do anything.
The night after the same guest did the same. I called the reception and they came to check. They decided to call the police that showed up at 5am. I didn't sleep again for the second night.
I asked for a refund and they answered that I booked through a 3rd party and I have to ask them but no problem for them to authorize the refund.
Today I got a different answer from Expedia that said they refused the refund, because I stayed in their hotel as booked.
My vacation was ruined because without sleep  me and my son of 7 yo we were too tired to walk around.
Never again in this hotel

title: Great location
text: The location of this hotel was great for everything we wanted to do in midtown. It was also very close to grand central allowing easy travel to other parts of the city. The room was clean and modern, but very small. It was fine though because we just need a place to sleep. The noise from the street was loud (6th floor) but I imagine that’s most places in the city. The continental breakfast was a nice bonus.

title: Lovely place in New York city!
text:
Lovely place with beautiful and kind peoples. We were warmly received! 

Christopher, Aliyah, Francesca and Shawn are always ready to help us if we have a question or need help. 

It's my first time in New York and I'm so happy to stay here! I'm thankful and really happy.

I recommend this hotel it's close from time square.

title: Excelente Hospedaje!
text: Muy bien ubicado, cerca a Times Square y varios puntos de interés y paradas obligatorias en Manhattan... habitaciones cómodas, personal amable y un buen desayuno ligero para comenzar el día, muy recomendado!

title: Muy buena opcion, excelentemente ubicado
text:
El hotel es basico, pero cumple con todas las necesidades en una visita a NY.
Muy buena atencion en el check inn,  habitaciones muy pequeñas pero en muy buen estado.
Desayuno grab and go pero correcto, ayuda a comenzar la jornada sin un gasto adicional.
Excelente ubicacion a pasos de la 5ta avenida y 2 cuadras de Times Square y varios subtes.
Muy recomendable, estuvimos 10 noches y la experiencia fue muy buena.

title: Location
text: I was quite Happy with this choice. Yes it is small but it offered a continential breakfast ( croissants , juice and coffee)  in an excellent central mid town Manhattan location with great transportation connectivity. I found the front desk to be particularly competent   professional and friendly.

title: increíble Servicio
text: Estuvimos en el hotel por dos Dias. Los cuartos son cómodos, mordernos y limpios. La area de desayuno es pequeña pero es muy eficiente. El desayuno no es una de las areas fuertes del Hotel muy repetitivo pero cumple su objetivo. Muy agradecido con Cristopher de recepción. Me ayudo a mi y a mi esposo constantemente con absolutamente todo. Nos guió por los metros, direcciones y   Sobre todo nos tubo mucha paciencia al explicar todo los procesos y hasta nos ayudo hacer compras online.

title: Excelente Ubicación
text:
Excelente ubicación
Amables los empleados
Servicio de limpieza de la habitación día de por medio 
Desayuno un poco pobre en variedad (aunque más que suficiente para mi y mi sobrina adolescente) 
Deberían tener un dispenser de agua fresca disponible a toda hora, tampoco hay durante el desayuno - Idealmente también café !!!!

title: Fantastic location, great hotel
text:
Stayed for 2 nights in a twin room on 14th floor. Room was clean, comfortable beds, relatively quiet considering the location, bathroom had gorgeous smelling shower gels etc.
Breakfast was fine for a grab and go, with pastries etc constant replenished. Yes it does get a little crowded, so we just went back to the room if there were no seats.

Staff were all super helpful and friendly.

Location, 5 minutes to Times Square, 7 minutes to Broadway ( perfect if you are seeing a show!)
Nearby shops on 5th Avenue including The North Face, NBA shop, Barnes and Noble.

We spent our evenings in the peaceful Bryant Park which was a few minutes walk away, having grabbed a salad or pizza at Wholefoods .

An excellent stay, would recommend. Thank you.

title: MALA ATENCIÓN HORRIBLE TRATO
text: Teniamos una reserva hace 5 meses. Llegamos al hotel y nos dicen que nola tienen. Después de un viaje de mas de 12 horas. Nos han tratado fatal. Un trato humillante e indigno. Intento avisaros para que elijais otro alojamiento.Nos dejaron más de 3 horas tirados. A 3500 kilómetros de nuestra casa. Nos han cobrados más de 200 euros de mas. Un trato vejatorio e indigno.  Muy lamentable.

title: pessima esperienza
text: camera da 4 piccolissima, condizionatore montato basso sparato su un letto ingestibile, molto rumore dalle scale e dall'esterno. colazione  scarsa in un ambiente minuscolo all'ingresso, acqua a pagamento. eravamo al 22 piano e per salire e scendere ci si metteva una vita perchè il personale delle pulizie occupava perennemente l'ascensore con la biancheria. alla partenza ci hanno prenotato un'auto privata per l'aeroporto dicendoci una tariffa che in realtà era tutt'altra: l'autista ha dovuto scusarsi per l'errore del personale dell'hotel.

title: Poco più di ostello a prezzi folli
text: Abbiamo soggiornato una notte in questo albergo prima di tornare in Italia e ci è bastata. È poco più di un ostello, stanza piccola e molto basica. Prezzo assurdo in relazione a quanto offerto e peraltro ti fanno pagare una somma aggiuntiva anche se lasci i bagagli in albergo prima di andare in aeroporto. Si salva solo la posizione centralissima

title: THANK YOU, CRISTOPHER!!!
text:
Clean, comfortable hotel. Kind staff. Breakfast is quite "basic"  but the position of the hotel is so great you actually don't care. CRISTOPHER (from the reception) was SO GREAT he helped us recover almost $1200 his collegue had mistakenly charged on our credit card when we checked in (bad, bad mistake!! Luckily we checked our transactions before checking out!) 
THANK YOU, CRISTOPHER, for being so kind and professional!

title: Solid Four
text: We stayed in the suite (well, bedroom plus living room with sofa bed). Not luxury by any means, but it serves the purpose with the price comparable or slightly lower to room and utility of the same size in the similar location. Close but not too close to time square (which  serves us right, since this is the teenth time visitiing NY). Breakfast is utilitarian (chick fill a, McD and Pret are stone throw away). Room not made every day (only trash and towel change every day). Felix from front desk is friendly and helpful. Will return  if the needs call.

title: Belated Birthday Celebration
text: We stayed in your hotel to celebrate a belated birthday for myself and my son. The staff were so kind and helpful to me and my children. The rooms were clean with a good size bathroom, the hotel was in a great location too.

title: The front office makes it excellent
text:
Six days stay was seamless because of the front office staff. They were all very helpful, courteous and cheerful. 

We arrived midnight and Aliyah assisted us in the check in and was a breeze. We were given a room in the lower lobby due to high occupancy however we were transferred the following day. We encountered a huge problem on the send day and Crystal was a great help. Shout out to Chris, Francesca and Matthew who are very helpful and amiable.

title: Great staff
text: Francesca made our trip to New York City seamless. I had some technical difficulties on my end but when I called in to the hotel, Francesca corrected everything and a burden was unloaded off of my shoulders. She was kind, helpful and truly was the sunshine at the front desk.

title: Great service
text: We booked this hotel and couldn’t of been happier. The very sweet Francesca was so helpful with every aspect of our stay. No matter what it was, she was happy to do it with a smile on her face! Great service! When needed help with checking in early, she was right there ready to help us on the phone and did everything she could!

title: très bon séjour!
text: Nous avons séjourné au citadines durant 11 nuits, très bon rapport qualité prix pour l'emplacement, les chambres ne sont pas très grandes,  personnel sympathique , pour le ménage il faut effectivement demander la veille pour qu'il soit fait mais tout est bien expliqué lors du chek-in, et vous pouvez demander au personnel à tout moment pour des savons ou autre... On entend un peu les bruits de la rue (en même temps on est en plein manhattan) mais après une journée à marcher nous n'avons pas eu de difficulté à dormir.... petite chose à revoir il serait bien d'avoir des gels douche plutôt que des savons et le petit déjeuner qui pour nous était compris dans le prix mais qui est en fait plus une collation (peu de choix) et que nous avons préféré  emporter car peu de place à la réception. Sinon nous sommes ravis de notre séjour et reviendrons sans hésiter.

title: Really helpful staff!
text: Francesca was so helpful and welcoming, and she absolutely made my stay here! 😚 Big shout out to her!!!  The room was spacious, albeit a little humid. There was no soap in the bathroom which was a lil weird!

title: The best experience ever!!!
text:
During my extensive 2-weeks-stay for business in New York, the company booked me at this hotel. I have never ever in my life experienced such an overall bliss and great experience. I was always treated with more than respect, my belongings were carefully taken care off. For the first time nothing disappeared. Everyone treated me and my crew with so much care, patience and elegance. 
I am more than impressed with the professionalism and special skills that Crystal Estepa; Matthew and Alex Rodriguez. The owners of the hotel know how to recruit them he best! Thank you for the wonderful experience!

title: Meglio di così.....
text:
In occasione dei nostri 60 la mia amica ed io abbiamo scelto come meta New York e optato per l'hotel Cittadines Connect Fifth Avenue,  scelta azzeccatissima, a cominciare dalla posizione strategica, alla reception al nostro arrivo siamo stati accolte da Matteo e al mattino abbiamo trovato Francesca, due ragazzi giovani, sempre sorridenti, molto disponibili che ci hanno aiutate in ogni nostra richiesta ed esigenza ci hanno fatto sentire veramente accolte , nonostante l'hotel sia frequentato da numerosissimi turisti, questo fa di Francesca e Matteo la differenza.
La camera assegnataci era pulitissima, ogni giorno su richiesta ( usa così come il farsi fare le pulizie) ci venivano consegnati 3 asciugamani a persona, comunque all'arrivo queste cose vengono dette con la consegna del budget.
La colazione è  composta da brioche di due diverse tipologie ( ma dopo 9 gg ci vorrebbe una variante di gusto) , yogurt,  succo d'arancia, frutta fresca, the e caffè a volontà

title: Stay at New York
text:
We are globe trotters. However oir stay at the Citadines has been the worst so far. The rooms are not only small but also poorly lighted. Breakfast was pathetic and so was the coffee on offer. Same course served for 5 days, even the yogurts served were same. Croissants and Danish Pastries were dry and stale. There was no butter / cream / jam to eat them with. Eggs and fruits, the basic ingredients of any breakfast were unheard of by the staff. There was hardly any fresh milk for coffee. This is certainly not the way we would like to start our mornings on a vacation. Hotel charged Resort Fee!!. The place barely qualifies for a hotel, what was there as a Resort?. Staff did not understand basic english and items needed had to be shown on internet. Would never suggest this hotel, even to an enemy!!!
Have sent the same review to their management.

title: Trip with small children
text: We arrived super early in the morning and were not able to check in early as we hoped for but Alex from Citadines Connect and a very nice older lady sure showed their hospitality by doing their best. Alex was professional yet funny, polite and helpful. He took care of our belongings and continued to check if any rooms were available. The older lady took care of us by cleaning the room and making sure we got a room with 2 double beds when she saw me exhausted with 2 kids and a ton of luggage. It was quiet, clean and easy access to everything. Breakfast really helped since it's a pain to go out just to get breakfast. Our first short trip to NY was wonderful n well worth it. Thank you Alex and older lady who I didn't get your name!

title: No room cleaning and
text: No room cleaning for 3 days because they are short of staff and we were only told this on the 3rd day. Staff is neither helpful nor sympathetic with the situation. Human factor is a must in a hotel, specially when you are failling with your services. Hotel not recommended.

title: Wonderful location at a good price
text:
Stayed five nights . Great location, easy to walk to a number of the attractions.
Staff very friendly, responsive and act oriented.
Breakfast OK but could be organized slightly more effectively.
It’s a grab and go offering.
Fir those who want to pay a far price for a 100%  strong location… this is it.
Local bars and restaurants good.
Plus clean and today .

title: Citadines hotel
text:
Alex is the best,he talked a lot with me and he was so sweet and kind,I love him :3
He always had time for me even though he had to work, and I’m so happy about that because I really needed someone to talk to <3

title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAIID FOR
text: Stayed here for 2 nights, staff was very cordial and friendly. They let you leave your bags in the hotel before and after your check out. Our room had a broken safe and they could not fix it but they where super nice and even offered us a new room but we decided to keep it. The room has virtually no soundproofing so you hear everything in the hallway and outside the building. But once again you get what you paid for. I recommend this if you just wanna spend a couple nights in the city.

title: Citadines Connect Fifth Avenue & Alex are the best!
text:
Alex is the most welcoming person I've ever encountered in all of the hotels I've stayed in. I don't normally take the time to leave reviews, but he made us feel at home the moment we arrived and every moment since then. 

Our room is the perfect size for our family of four with all of the amenities we need. The location is nice and quiet, wedged between the best shopping in NY and Times Square. 

We love it at the Citadines Connect Fifth Avenue and can't wait to come back!

title: Excelente servicio
text: Alex es un hombre maravilloso, su servicio increíble, me ayudó con todos mis requerimientos. Gracias Alex por tu amabilidad . Recomiendo este hotel familia y cálido y el servicio maravilloso de su gente.

title: Awful experience here. Management could care less.
text: We booked 3 nights on the week of July 4th. On our very first night when we came back from spending time in the city we came back to take the elevator to our 14th floor room.
