text: We had never heard of this hotel but a friend booked it for a group trip.  From the moment we arrived we felt very welcome.  Though small, the lobby was a comfortable, low key place to hang out and also to have a quick breakfast the next morning.  All of the staff were friendly and helpful.  It was clean and the bed was so comfortable.  The room was so quiet, possibly because there are only a few rooms on each floor.  We will definitely plan to stay here again.

title: Clean room, friendly staff, breakfast too sugary
text:
Rooms are clean, staff friendly.

However Breakfast is too sugary.  The muffins and cones are way too sweet to start the day.  Suggest to add these items: Hard boil eggs, croissant, multi-grain and white bread for toast.  Fruit should have more varieties to include kiwi, blueberries, strawberries, oranges, grapes, honey dew and water melon etc.  Should also include beverages such as milk, orange juice, apple juice etc.

title: Great stay!
text:
When reading some of the reviews before booking we were slightly sceptical about this hotel. However, when we arrived at the hotel it was brilliant. It was in a fantastic location and the staff were extremely helpful. We paid very little for the standard of hotel. Breakfast is included on most tariffs (or what I remember), but it is only light, which is perfect because you will obviously not want a full breakfast at the hotel, you’ll want to go out and eat America’s cuisine. If you are looking for somewhere to eat and have entertainment for breakfast, Ellen’s diner is unreal.

All in all, fantastic and thanks for our stay.

title: Bon emplacement surtout
text:
J'ai eu l'occasion de rester dans cet hôtel quelques jours.
Au début je suis arrivé avec une certaine appréhension.
Finalement,  je trouve cet hôtel correct et très bien situé. 
Vous êtes à proximité des axes très visités de New York. 
C'est pratique pour faire une pause entre deux visites.

Par contre une chose est à revoir le petit déjeuner  :
OK pour le grab and go breakfast mais bon, les yaourts sont à changer:  "ils ne sont pas bons du tout" yaourt maigre marque taillefine ou truc banane fraise sans lait...
Il n'y a pas de lait en grande quantité, juste du lait pour votre café. 
Le café est à revoir, il n'est pas bon non plus. 
Les minis muffins et compagnie c'est vraiment quand on a vraiment faim. Des petites madeleines au vrai beurre seraient bien meilleures.

Bref à part ça le nettoyage est bien fait, les dames de chambre le personnel de  l'accueil et autre sont très polis et serviables.
Bref j'y retournerais volontiers mais pas pour le petit déjeuner.

title: Gran ubicación
text: Hotel muy céntrico, a pocos metros de la 5a avenida, Times Square, Grand Central... se puede ir paseando hasta Central Park... etc. La habitación que nos tocó era correcta. Teniamos 2 camas de matrimonio y nos sobraba una al ser solo una pareja. El espacio estaría mejor aprovechado con una sola cama y alguna butaca o sofá. La habitación daba a la parte trasera por lo que las vistas no eran muy buenas. El espacio para los desayunos es un poco reducido y se llena enseguida. Faltan espacios comunes anchos. Pero la relación calidad, precio y ubicación es muy buena

title: Great hotel for sightseeing or else
text:
Very very good value for money. We stayed at this hotel for 5 nights and never had any problems with noise or anything else. Our room was on the first floor. Since our room was facing the inner courtyard (construction site), we had no view at all, but we didn't care, we weren't in New York to look out the window. The hotel is in a really good location, in 10 minutes you can walk to the Time Squer and you can easily walk to the Empire Statue Building (about 20 minutes). You can also be at the Grand Central Station in 10 minutes, from there you can easily reach everything you want by subway. In 15 minutes you are in Centeal Park (walking). So the location of the hotel is just great. Very, very friendly and helpful staff who are available 24 hours a day. The breakfast is grab and go, so for those who value breakfast very much, you should plan your breakfast outside. There are small muffins, orange juice, coffee, tea, yoghurt ....
For us this was sufficient, we are not big breakfasts it was absolutely sufficient and otherwise there is a Starbucks right across the street. There is a great pub 10 meters further on (higly recommended, I will also write something about it). The rooms are "small" (without wardrobe) but you have everything you need, a comfortable bed and a clean bathroom. I definitely recommend this hotel and the fact that you have to pay the hotel bill right at the beginning is very common so nothing to worry about.

title: Just stayed here 1/26, AWFUL. Far below par.
text:
This review will he backed up by FACT pictures. Booked what felt like an amazing deal on Travelzoo, only I can see exactly why it was so cheap. 

Really polite and helpful girl at check in, then it all goes downhill from there. She says...”oh, you booked one of our best rooms!”...so when I ride up to 2106, let’s just say it was woefully unimpressive. Filthy room, including blackish crud on pillows that I’m praying isn’t mold. No lie, pics attached. Hot water in bathroom? Nonexistent. Lukewarm at best- I ask them to send engineering they say he can come tomorrow. So I ask them to send someone to document it and prove I’m not delusional- and he sticks his hand under it, and goes “see, it just takes a while to warm up!”. Wasn’t warm in the least. 

Kept heater on full blast all night to fight off the actively cold air hemorrhaging in through the leaking windows. 

Just a straight up bust of a hotel; sell your location to someone else who will actually do something with it- you don’t care about your customers in the least.

title: Too burocratic to receive payments
text: Normally when I go to the hotels my boyfriend is the one who pays. And they didnt accept the credcard that I have in my hands to pay the hold even him calling and saying he could make anything that was necessary to proof he allowed me to use his credcard. Now I m having to look for another hotel. Hungry thirsty and pissed of

title: Ottima posizione
text: Il punto di forza è sicuramente la posizione, pochi minuti a piedi per raggiungere Time Square. L'hotel è ben arredato e pulito. Il punto di debolezza è la prima colazione, scarso assortimento di cibo e pochissimi posti a sedere.

title: Χριστούγεννιατικες διακοπές
text:
Μια παρά πολύ καλή επιλογή ξενοδοχείου!!! Η τοποθεσία του είναι φανταστική, είσαι κοντά σε όλα....
Τα δωμάτια του είναι άνετα και φωτεινά. Τα βρήκαμε καθαρά και κάθε μέρα τα καθάριζαν ξανά και άλλαζαν τις πετσέτες. 
Το πρωινό του θα μπορούσε να έχει και κάτι αλμυρό όχι μόνο γλυκά.

title: Great hotel perfect location
text:
Having read some reviews we were dubious about our stay. 
We had no reason to be. The hotel was great! Our room (701)  was a good size , bathroom modern and very clean. 
The only thing room was missing was a chest of drawers or something as very limited storage space for clothes but we managed fine. 
We didn’t make use of grab and go breakfast except for a coffee on our way out in the mornings which was perfect for us. 
Staff were polite and helpful. 
Perfect location for NYC 5 min walk to all central locations, 15mins to CP and 10 mins to central station where could get subway to pretty much anywhere. 
I would highly recommend this hotel and hopefully will return one day. 
Thank you!

title: Great location & clean room
text:
My wife and I stayed for 8 nights. We got a room on the top floor facing the street. I could hear some street noise (sirens from emergency vehicles seems to be the norm in NYC) but was not really bothered by it. Room size good enough for the 2 of us and 3 big luggage. Housekeeping did a good job cleaning the room everyday. Bathroom was a bit small but clean (no stains, etc.). Bed and pillows were comfy and AC worked well. 

Based on reviews and info on the hotel's website, I knew what to expect for breakfast - it wasn't great but was ok for us. There are a lot of restaurant/cafe options around the hotel. Hotel's location was GREAT! A lot of NYC must-sees were close by including the different subway lines. 

Only problem we encountered were the elevators. There would be days that only 1 would be working. Staying on the top floor, using the stairs wasn't an option for us. There was also a time that both elevators weren't working so we had to wait at the lobby for over 15 minutes. The elevators and lobby can get busy during breakfast time. 

Overall, we enjoyed our stay.

title: Carino
text: Hotel carino pulito , stanze piccolissime a differenza di come si vede al momento della prenotazione su Booking, colazione indecente, un solo tavolo con 10 sedie x un’hotel con più 100 stanze!!!! Farebbero meglio a toglierla!!! Posizione Ottima a 2 passi da Time Square!!!

title: The best choice ever made for my stay in New York and the possible reason of my return there.
text: I do not like New York. Perhaps I should say I didn't like many things about New York. My stay at the Citadines Connect may have just changed that. I enjoyed the proximity to things and easy access to restaurants. Enjoyed my time there, easy check in and check out.

title: Just Ok
text: We arrived very early and was very tired.  The person who helped us with our luggage was extremely helpful.  He kept our luggage so we could go for a walk.  When we checked into our room, I was a bit disappointed in the very tiny space we were in.  Literally no room for our luggage.  Although they kept it clean everyday but I just can’t believe how small the room was.  The one thing that always put a smile on my face everyday was the guy who took our luggage.  I wish I got his name, but he was so amazing!  He took the time to hand my six year old Grand Daughter a candy everyday.  So, thank you!

title: Estafadores!! Cancelan sin razón
text:
Hicimos una reserva en Mayo para 1 semana en diciembre. El mismo día que volábamos de Madrid a NY leímos comentarios muy negativos sobre cancelaciones sin justificar por parte del hotel. Comprobamos ese mismo día que la reserva estaba confirmada. 
La sorpresa fue que nada más llegar a NY nos saltó un mensaje de Booking indicando que el hotel nos había cancelado la reserva....se justificaron diciendo que  intentaron hacer un cargo de $100 y la tarjeta no funcionaba. Una gran mentira, durante todo el viaje estuvimos pagando con esa misma tarjeta sin problemas. También pagamos el nuevo hotel que tuvimos que reservar esa misma noche para no dormir en la calle.
Son unos estafadores, no recomendable para nada

title: NO RESERVEIS
text: estafadores. reservamos hace 2 meses para alojarnos en enero por 560 euros y si lo intentas reservar hoy vale 1200. por dicho motivo nos rechazaban continuamente la tarjeta hasta que presionamos y nos la aceptaron, pero no fue mas que un remedio temporal porque finalmente acabarian por cancelarnos la habitación justificando un "error" en el precio, cosa que sinceramente me olía. Todo esto por booking. En definitiva, no reserveis este hotel, porque puede que a un mes de tener que ir y despues de dos meses de haberlo reservado os dejen sin hotel. Booking nos ha ofrecido opcion de realojo pero claramente peor que este hotel que es lo que habiamos pagado. fatal todo

title: Sentralt, god standard
text:
Svært god beliggenhet, rent, framstår nytt, gode senger, små men stilrene og delikate rom. Frokost en vits for oss nordmenn, svært lite utvalg og ingen brødmat. Besto av noe frukt, yoghurt, muffins/søtbakst og kaffe. Inntas i den trange resepsjonen. God wifi, fungerte stabilt. Tett luft på rom, vindu kan ikke opnes og airconditionen bråkte noe. Vennlig personal, hjelpsomme. Vi fikk nytt rom da vi var skuffet over første natt under bakkeplan, 8.etg var mye bedre selv om «utsikt» var kun til bakgård. 
Alt i alt fornøyd og kan anbefales :)

title: No frills, good location and comfy
text: The title sums it up. No bells and whistles for this hotel but it’s hard to beat the location which is near Broadway, Rockefeller Center, etc. The room was tiny but very, very cozy. We would probably stay here again on our next trip to New York.

title: Great hotel
text:
I stayed at this hotel for three nights. When I stay in NYC, I often stay in Times Square, but decided to stay at Citadines this time as it looked like good value for money.

Often in NYC, you can queue for up to an hour to check into your hotel. With Citadines, the hotel is small with around 100 rooms. Therefore I never seen a queue once at the check in desk. The staff were friendly and happy to help. The room was clean and stylish. The hotel were happy to keep bags in a storage room which was secure, on the day of checkout.

The location is perfect. It took us 5 minutes to walk to Times Square and 5 minutes to Saks/Rockefeller.

I read a lot of negative reviews regarding breakfast. However, I expected a grab and go service, so I honestly could not fault it. I was more than happy with the coffee, juice, fruit, yoghurts and pastry items available each morning.

title: Great location and value for money
text: Location is perfect. Hotel is very new, clean and staff is friendly. Breakfast is not great, but the staff provide a great service. Internet speed is good. Overall, very happy with my stay (4 nights).

title: Fantastic stay
text: It was a perfect location, just around the corner from Rockefeller, Empire State Building and 5th Avenue. It was a very nice and clean room, and the staff were so sweet and helpful. I will recommend this hotel to everybody!

title: They cancelled my booking
text:
I made a reservation with citadines quite prior my arrival in new york.

After a month they cancelled due to wrong rates as they said.

They offered me 2 hotels at the same price but none of them had reviews as the one was just new and the other one is opening in late december.

So how can i stay in a hotel with no reviews?

So i was quite dissapointed since it wasnt my fault and i spent another 2 days in order to find a suitable hotel for me and i declined their ooffer to stay in an unrated hotel

title: Incubo
text: Al mio arrivo in tardissima serata, dopo un viaggio intercontinentale e niente cena, alla reception non avevano la mia prenotazione! Avevo pagato tutto per intero in anticipo (quasi 900 dollari x quattro notti!) nonostante abbia mostrato la ricevuta della prenotazione e del pagamento al receptionist, lo stesso non ha sentito ragioni. Dopo quasi due ore di telefonate e insistenze, mi ha assegnato temporaneamente una stanza che adibiscono a deposito. Il giorno dopo ho dovuto lasciare la stanza e solo nel pomeriggio me ne hanno dato un’altra, dicendomi che la colpa era stata di una dello staff con poca esperienza che aveva dimenticato di inserire la prenotazione. Ovviamente niente scuse ne altro.... un vero incubo che non auguro a nessuno. La stanza è minuscola ma almeno pulita. Non c’è armadio e ti devi accampare come meglio puoi. La colazione è la ciliegina sulla torta: merendine da discount servite nei pressi della reception. Il mio consiglio è di stare alla larga da questo posto, anche perché vedevo che molta altra gente aveva problemi alla reception e i tempi di check in erano molto lunghi anche in altri casi.

title: Estafadores y mentirosos
text: Tened mucho cuidado porque hice una reserva hace tres meses a través de Booking para alojarme en agosto de 2020 a muy buen precio y me la acaban de cancelar alegando que mi tarjeta no es válida cuando no es cierto. He utilizado la tarjeta para pagar otras estancias en EEUU sin problema. Me pidieron que actualizara la tarjeta y lo hice, e incluso les envié un correo electrónico que ni siquiera me contestaron. No obstante Booking me pidió que hablara con el banco para asegurarme que mi tarjeta está bien y ver si es cierto que hay alguna operación del hotel denegada. Y efectivamente la tarjeta funciona correctamente y no hay ninguna operación rechazada. Así que como me temía, cancelan las reservas que no les interesan (ahora la estancia cuesta el doble) con esa excusa. Os animo a que si os sucede lo mismo, aviséis a Booking o a otras centrales de reserva de su práctica. No hay derecho que plataformas de reservas tan serias trabajen con este tipo de hoteles, porque jamás he tenido un problema con Booking.

title: Nos han estafado
text:
Teníamos reservado hace un puñado de meses y ahora de repente dicen que por fallos en el cobro de la tarjeta se anula la reserva, es mentira, se les ha facilitado varías tarjetas más y tampoco las han aceptado, así especulan con los precios.

Una vergüenza

title: Perfect for Girl's Getaway
text: A friend and I had a night out in NYC, taking a break from our kids and busy jobs, and Citadines Connect was the perfect place to stay. We had a double queen room and had plenty of room. The design, decor and aesthetic of the apartment was modern and refreshing. I especially loved the bathroom! The room was very clean, beds were so comfortable and the staff was incredibly nice. I will definitely be staying again!

title: Excelente ubicacion
text:
La ubicacion del hotel es excelente, a pocos metros de todo, solo que las habitaciones del frente son sumamente ruidosas, se escucha todo lo que sucede en la calle, y lo peor ocurre en la madrugada. Seria bueno que mejoren la insonorizacion de las mismas.
La cama y almohadas muy comodas.
El baño bien equipado, aunque pequeño, pero con muy buena presion de agua
A la habitacion le faltaria una heladera para poder guardar bebidas y fruta.
El desayuno que ofrecen es basico, pero aceptable.
El espacio destinado para el desayuno (el cual queda en la entrada del hotel) es sumamente pequeño, y segun la hora hay que esperar para sentarse.

title: ESTAFADORES, CUIDADO!
text:
Hace 3 meses reserve para la primera semana del año una habitación para cuatro personas, hoy han cancelado mi reserva alegando que mis tres tarjetas de crédito disponible en la plataforma de reserva no funciona, cosa que es rotundamente falsa. Ahora la misma habitación y fechas la venden a casi el doble...

Huid de este hotel mientras podáis, son unos estafadores que os pueden dejar en la calle.

title: Mitigé
text:
Les + :
. Situation géographique (proche Time square, Broadway, métro...)
. Literie très confortable 
. Des resto à proximité 
. Très propre 
. Personnel sympathique 

Les - :
. Très bruyant (très dérangeant la nuit) avec une fenêtre qui donne sur la rue principale avec une circulation permanente jour et nuit, notamment de gros camions. Isolation simple vitrage, on sent l’air à côté de la vitre.
. Chauffage également très bruyant lorsqu’il déclenche.
. 3 types de gâteaux pour déjeuner avec lait, café ou thé, 2 choix yaourts, 2 choix jus de fruits, 2 fruits... qui sont identiques tous les jours.
. Température de l’Eau de la douche qui ne se règle pas (déjà programmée : parfois on aimerait quelques degrés en plus lorsqu’il fait très froid).

title: Excelente ubicacion y todo impecable y nuevo!
text: El hotel es Muy bueno! La ubicacion perfecta pra estar cerca de todo y zona segura para volver de noche. El cuarto y baño impecable. Todo nuevo. El tamaño del cuarto bastante bien por ser new york. El desayuno es bastante basico, pero excelente relacion calidad y precio del hotel! Super recomendable!!!

title: Mejorar zona del desayuno
text: Buenas instalaciones y bien ubicado. Deberían mejorar la zona del desayuno, es muy pequeña y también variar más las opciones del desayuno,solo cambiaban los muffins. El personal muy amable y respetuoso.

title: Great place to stay
text: Really enjoyed our stay here. Would recommend for location. Two blocks to the Main Street in Times Square, two blocks to Rockefeller Center, very close to Grand Central and very easy walk to Central Park. Breakfast was continental style, pastries, yogurt, fruit and good coffee. Enough for us. Very quiet. Would have liked a sm fridge for room but other than that it was great for Mother Daughter trip. Felt very safe here.

title: Nuestra estadía en ny
text:
Excelente hotel ubicación fantástica y muy buen servicio
La atención del personal es muy buena y siempre dispuestos a ayudarte
El li y es chiquito pero te permiten comer ahí mismo si traes de afuera algo que en ny es caro
La habitación chica y lo único malo para mejorar es que tendría que pensar en más estantes para la ropa porque no hay lugar
Otro tema para mejorR es restringir el uso del elevador en el horario del desayuno ya que limpieza lo traba y tal vez estás 15’ para bajar y 9.30 en punto te levantan todo
El desayuno es tranquilo pero para empezar el día está más que bien
Volvería sin dudarlo quinta que estuvimos muy cómodos y el personal es muy dispuesto siempre con una sonrisa
Eso vale. Estando en otro país

title: Superb value for NY
text: Loved our 10-day stay in the hub of all the action, walking distance to Times Square and Hells Kitchen.  Superb value especially when compared to other similar properties in Manhattan. Loved the new modern bathrooms and the king size bed.

title: Good hotel
text: A good hotel on a good location. Clean and comfortable rooms. Service of the staff is good. Breakfast is ok for New York standards, but good be better. Overall a good hotel what has a great value for New York.

title: nice stay in nyc
text: nicely located. very clean, very helpful and kind staff. . the room had all the enmities we needed. the the breakfast is very poor - only coffee, tea yogurt and some kinds of sweet cookies. we had to buy breakfast across the street. over all , for very expensive city like NYC this is good value for money.

title: Quite good, quite expensive
text: You don’t get a lot for your money in New York and that is the case here.  Top tip would be to visit Ambrosia deli directly over the road for a local breakfast experience. (The grab and go breakfast at the hotel was ok but limited).

title: Worst hotel stay of my life!
text:
Room was dirty, bed was small, other peoples bathrooms thing were left in my bathroom, no alarm clocks in the room and worst of all, one elevator was working, waited 20 minutes for one, never stopped on my floor had to walk down 11 floors with suitcase and dress in a suit.  3 days later still waiting for my FOLIO from hotel, called them and email - nothing.

NEVER will stay here again & will share my experience with everyone.

title: Educati....Onesti
text:
Posto molto pulito e in pieno centro a Manhattan.
Colazione abbastanza scarsa sotto le aspettative!
Purtroppo abbiamo fatto un errore nella prenotazione abbiamo prenotato per errore un giorno in meno...ci hanno buttato in strada con 3 bambini alle 18.00!!! Abbiamo chiesto se ci aiutavano a trovare un altro hotel ci hanno detto che sulla stessa strada ne erano presenti altri due... naturalmente pieni! Pessima persona alla reception il 31 agosto!!! Come se non bastasse ieri è arrivato l'estratto conto della carta di credito con una bella sorpresa....dopo averci buttato in strada ci hanno preso anche 319 USD!! Come se avessimo dormito la notte in albergo!!!

title: Liars and scammers
text: This hotel is a bunch of con artists.  I booked a room with them when I arrived at the hotel they told me there was a mistake with booking all the rooms were booked because the U.N was in town. The man at the desk told me dont worry he will take care of the charge on my bank card for booking the room. My card was charged $203 the next few days I called the hotel about the reversal of the room charge that I never stayed at because they said a room wasn't available. The supervisor said I never showed up and I wasn't able to get my refund.  This hotel has a bunch of thieves working there and liars. I definitely dont recommend this hotel and if you find yourself staying there please make sure to get everyones name and print outs of your bill and if they say they will refund your card for a charge or deposit ask for it in writing.

title: Super Lage, recht schickes Hotel
text:
Wir haben zu viert vier Nächte in dem Hotel verbracht. Leider waren die Zimmer doch recht klein, auf den Fotos sahen sie größer aus. Die Klimaanlage ist definitiv zu laut und die Fenster konnte man nicht öffnen.
Der Service war völlig ok und sehr freundlich.
Fazit: Die Lage gleicht die kleinen Zimmer aus. Also empfehlenswert

title: Bon hôtel très bien placé
text:
Hôtel réservé pour 1 semaine à NYC
Chambre et sdb modernes
cafetière et café, Thé disponibles 
propreté impeccable, draps et serviettes changés tous les jours 
Lits king size et literie très confortable 
Produits de toilette qui sentent super bon !!
Boule quies conseillés car la rue très bruyante (nyc!) 
petit déjeuner inclus pas mal de choix et possibilité de manger en chambre si pas de place en bas

title: Muito bem localizado
text:
Hotel simples! Sem luxos, serviço de quarto bom. Quartos adequados para o valor. Ponto franco: café da manhã muito simples, nunca muda. Local para café da manhã: o lobby de entrada, limpo equipado, mas limitado (muitos ficam impacientes e levam a refeição para o quarto, o que piora a experiencia.
Ponto forte: localização é excelente, por isso o hotel está sempre lotado.
Custo beneficio vale para quem dá prioridade para localização (economiza em transporte).

title: Geweldige locatie, heerlijk hotel
text:
Locatie is geweldig! Om de hoek
bij Times Square, tegenover het hotel een Starbucks, links af, 5th Street met veel leuke winkels, loopafstand van Empire Statebuilding. En heel dichtbij Broadway theaters. Wat een heerlijk hotel. De kamer was schoon en groot genoeg, modern ingericht en van alle gemakken voorzien. Badkamer met bad en föhn. Receptie aardig en behulpzaam. Raphael bracht mijn koffer naar boven en bewaarde hem de laatste dag in een apart hok. Goede WiFi. En een heerlijke ruimte beneden om te zitten, telefoon of laptop op te laden..

title: Surprising great hotel
text:
Excellent location... Great value...light breakfast included adding even more to the value.. Clean room, updated.. Would stay again..
Just around corner of 5th Ave and 45... Very close to great tourist spots in midtown

title: Regular
text: Hotel con buena ubicación, pero donde destaca negativamente la insonorización de las habitaciones, el tamaño de estas, no hay sitio donde colocar la ropa y el staff que hace de salón de desayuno el cual es ridículo para el número de personas que hay. El desayuno es básico, cereales, azucarados, leche, café, yoghurt y muffins.

title: Plutôt bien mais...
text: Hôtel plutôt moderne, situé à 5 mn à pied de Time square!! avec petit déjeuner Pick up and Go, literie nickel, suite pour 4 avec 2 télés, mais chambre plutôt petite, SDB très petite, et pour notre cas, chambre donnant sur une cour intérieur rempli de moteur de climatisation et un énorme tube de ventilation + machine à glace sur le palier= bruit incessant!!! Nous avons passé 3 nuits un peu difficiles.

title: Excellent Hotel, good location, friendly staff
text:
We spent 3 weeks in this hotel this summer. 
Excellent hotel and location and very friendly staff.
Some negatives 
  - Lifts are too slow. 
  - house keeping service slightly poor - always missing the required number of towels

title: Great staff,location, and price
text:
Stayed here during the middle of August and had a great experience. Free breakfast in the morning, free Wi-Fi, and great people. Mostly tourists due to the location near Rockefeller Center, but a great spot if you’re in the city working.

The people who made it great were the front desk agents Anthony + Joanne followed by Lancine and Roberto.

Thanks for a great stay.

title: Un hôtel à éviter
text:
Je suis resté 3 jours dans cet hôtel qui est on peut l’avouer plutôt bien situé. Malheureusement, c’est un trompe l’œil, le staff et les concierges sont d’arrogantes personnes. Le réceptionniste, Anthony, est un homme sexiste et hautain, qui s’est permis de se moquer de ma famille. Une attitude détestable et honteuse. 
De plus, ne compter pas sur une douche bien chaude car il n’y a pas d’eau chaude le soir!!! Incroyable, du jamais vu! Les chambres sont mal placées avec une vue sur des murs, les femmes de ménages vous réveillent à 9h comme sa juste pour voir! N’importe quoi!!!
Enfin le petit déjeuner est infecte et minuscule, même pas de pain! Je déconseille cet hôtel à tous les touristes!

title: Very convenient
text:
As a New York first timer, this was the perfect hotel and location. The room I got was very cozy and was a haven recluse from New York’s winter.

It is also within 3-5 blocks from Bryant Park, Times Squre, Crand Central Station and within a few more The Rockefeller, Empire state, St. Patrick’s Cathedral and Central Park, thus making it very convenient to walk around and explore. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Prima hotel voor de prijs
text: Hebben 6 nachten doorgebracht met gezin (2 grote kinderen). Prima te doen. Veel herrie van de airco of van buiten. Maar ja je zit midden in new york. Neem dus oordoppen mee. Ontbijt bestaat uit vaak wat fruit, en voor de rest melk, yoghurtjes en allerlei soorten cornflakes. Je zit heel centraal in Manhattan en kunt alle kanten op. Op de foto uitzicht achterzijde.

title: Fijn hotel, dicht bij Time Square
text: Heel hotel om een paar dagen te verblijven als je in de omgeving van Time Square wil verblijven. De koffie tijdens het ontbijt is prima. Veel klagers over het ontbijt en de daarbij behorende ruimte. Niks van aantrekken, ontbijt is voor NY begripen prima en de beperkte ruimte maakt het ook een stuk gezelliger.

title: Bon emplacement mais prestations limite pendant la rénovation
text:
L emplacement est idéal. 
Mais l hôtel, actuellement en rénovation; du coup les petits déjeuners étaient servis sous sacs à emporter... C'etait moyen. Les chambres sont corrects et l'accueil quelconque, je ne recommande que pour l'emplacement.

title: Fairly good
text: Room was clean but a bit small. Good location, very convenient for those looking to visit Times Square and Manhattan in general .Very good customer service but be prepared to carry your own luggage sometimes 😁

title: Emplacement idéal et très propre
text: Très bon rapport qualité prix, et incroyablement bien situé, à 15 mn à pied de partout !  Central Park, Time Square, Grand Central, Empire State Building, Rockfeller Center, et Bryant Park.  Tous les métros à proximité. Le personnel très sympa, et aussi un avantage supplémentaire, un petit dej simplifié est inclus dans le prix !  Nous avons été ravis de notre séjour d'environ 12 jours.

title: Hotel idealment situé - avec standard moyenne gamme
text:
Hôtel idéalement situé au milieu de Manhattan. Prix correct au regard de la prestation et de l’emplacement 
Le petit déjeuner est le point faible. Tout est emballé au titre du petit déjeuner et le choix est très restreint.

title: Met our expectations
text:
Small but clean and modern rooms 
Some traffic noice (but hey, it’s Manhattan, bring earplugs if noice sensitive)
Good location, walking distance to Time Square and Rockafellar
Friendly staff

The only thing that didn’t meet our expectations were the breakfast. Extremly simple; cereal, yogurt, juice and outmeal. Everything out of plastic containers and everything contained a lot of sugar. Would be nice to be able to choose from something without sugar. A simple bagel would be much better and contribute to the new york experience.

title: bon rapport Q/P pour la situation
text:
Bien situé, propre, avec un conseil, c est parfait.
Donc je vous invite a demander deux choses lors de votre réservation :
Pas de logement au niveau des distributeurs de glaçons, le bruit de la machine, bruit lorsque elle remue les glaçons et une chaleur qui avoisine les 30 degrés sur le palier.
Demander a loger très haut ou très bas, le 10 étage sur 21, déconseillé, trop haut pour descendre a pieds et l ascenseur est plein lorsqu'il descends, notamment a l heure du petit déjeuner.
Le petit déjeuner, ne pas s attendre a un buffet classique mais plutôt une collation mais qui dépanne toutefois.
Super bien situé, 10 min de Times square et de la gare centrale.
J ai trouvé un peu abusé de payer 15 $ pour une réservation de taxi (en réalité un uber déguisé), un détail.

title: Delusione
text:
Ottima posizione, a pochi passi da Time Square, stanza piccola ma accogliente e pulita. Completa mancanza di un armadio e nessuno spazio per mettere le valigie. Per tutta la settimana ci siamo sentiti presi in giro: 4 adulti in una stanza, avevamo biancheria da bagno per 3. Nonostante lo facessimo presente quotidianamente, e ogni volta ci veniva assicurato che avrebbero provveduto, per 8 gironi ci è sempre mancata la biancheria per 1 persona.
Poco lo spazio per la colazione (una mattina abbiamo dovuto portare da mangiare in camera perché non c'era il posto per sedersi), cibo solo confezionato e poco sia come varietà che come quantità: le cose che finivano non venivano rimpiazzate, e se non si era tra i primi a fare colazione si rischiava di saltarla. 
Personale gentile ma poco attento a risolvere i problemi

title: Solo la posizione
text: Scelto questo hotel per la posizione veramente strategica. All’arrivo (comunicato l’orario ) alle ore 21 non avevano più la camera da noi prenotata, pertanto vi hanno dato una camera al piano terra dove causa  via vai degli ospiti va tutte le ore,  non abbiamo chiuso occhio dal rumore.  Il giorno dopo siamo uscite presto e rientrate  alle 17. Abbiamo chiesto la nostra camera e niente da fare. Non avendo fatto il check out non è stato possibile entrare in possesso della camera prenotata. Altra notte travagliata. Il giorno dopo finalmente alle 9 del mattino abbiamo traslocato al settimo piano. Camera piccolissima. Moderna,  con vista parete. Per sapere che tempo faceva dovevamo scendere in strada. Colazione compresa,  solo dolci in cellophane. Inutile . Servizio hall scarso per la mancanza di informazioni. Infatti dopo due mesi dal rientro non ho ancora ricevuto di ritorno la cauzione di 100 dollari nonostante mail e sollecito attraverso Booking. Rapporto qualità prezzo scarsissimo.

title: Good location
text: Spent 3 nights in Citadines and loved the fact that it was close to all the interesting landmarks in New York. Just a few minutes from the Rockefeller center, a few minutes from 5th Avenue. Location wise, it wasn’t a bad choice. My room was fine, bed and pillows were comfortable. Had a coffee maker which I could also use for tea. There was an iron in the room but had no wardrobes so you hang clothes on the wall. Amenities in the bathroom, hair dryer but no shower cap. Downside was the noise that could be heard from other rooms and outside as well. Breakfast was basic grab and go food, nothing warm but hot tea or coffee provided. Check in and check out was straight forward and the receptionist was helpful. The lift can be jam packed in the mornings so it is best to have breakfast early.

title: Bon emplacement
text:
Nous avons séjourné au mois de juillet dans cet établissement qui est très  bien placé proche time square et de la cinquième avenue..
Le service est parfait les chambres très propres le personnel à l’écoute le seul petit bémol et le petit déjeuner que n’avons pas pris a l hôtel car La salle n’est pas appropriée quasiment dans le hall de l’hôtel. Le va et vient de personnes ne permettent pas de petit déjeuner dans la sérénité et le calme l’offre est à revoir.
Cependant vous pouvez à proximité trouver votre bonheur
Très bon rapport qualité prix et emplacement dans Manhattan

title: Manhattan's quaint secret Hotel:)
text: Our experience was amazing from the moment we walked in. Oula, the doorman greeted us and welcomed us to the city.  We were 2hrs early for check in however it smelled good, clean, and very organic. The room was small, however it worked out well for the 3 of us. Breakfast was good. The Staff was nice., I can't say enough about Oula just kind and informative about the city.

title: Hôtel citadinest connecter New York à fuir
text:
A fuir.Chambre minuscule  aucun  rangement. Climatisation très  bruyante. Horaires de petit déjeuner  de 6h30à9h30.
Salle de petit déjeuner  trop petite.on est obligé d'emporter la nourriture  dans la chambre et de manger sur un coin de lit.petit déjeuner  uniquement composé de cakes sous vide et de boîte de céréales. Rien de frais.pas de pain ni brioche. 
Je déconseille  fortement  cet hôtel  hors de prix.

title: Super surprise
text:
Nous avons séjourné 6 nuits, chambre 1102 du 1er au 7 juillet, dans cet hôtel.
La chambre etait tres bien avec un lit confortable, de très bonne taille.
Concernant le petit dejeuner je suis surprise de voir les gens de plaindre de ne pas pouvoir déjeuner sur site. Le principe est expliqué dès l'arrivé, il s'agit d'un pick and go autrement dit on prend et on emporte si pas de place pour dejeuner.
Le petit dej se compose de thé, café, yahourt, fruits, céréales, jus de fruit et muffins, je suis egalement étonnée de la deception des usagers concernant les propositions pour ce petit déjeuner.
En tout cas nous, nous y avons trouvé de quoi tenir toute la journée.
Pour la place nous n'avons pas eu de probleme pour dejeuner dans le lobby mais c'est vrai que nous y allions a 6h30 :-) de plus dans les ascenseurs il y a un document expliquant les horaires propices pour prendrele petit dejeuner.
Le personnel quand a lui est tres gentil.
Seul bemol la vue de la chambre pas top mais nous ne faisions qu'y dormir.
En conclusion je recommande fortement cet hotel qui est super bien situé a deux pas de times square et grand central et du metro.

title: I regret that I did not book for accessible room thinking that all hotels in USA follow the Universal Design principle.
text: STAFF are not responsive, a surprising attitude from a hospitality establishment. rooms are small and not well lighted; public accessible toilet door cannot be closed for wheelchair user. Poor service

title: Super endroit
text:
Séjour de 4nuits dans cette hôtel 
Très bien situé 
Le personnel au top 
Propre et bonne literie 
J insiste sur le personnel car vraiment à l écoute 
Très bien situé près de Time square 
Petit déjeuner express mais appréciable

title: Citadines que boa surpresa
text: Estive em abril em nova York e fiquei 4 noites hospedada no Citadines. O hotel é bem localizado e o staff muito educado. Eles servem um pequeno café pela manhã mas como não tem muito espaço o ideal é pegar uma fruta e um iogurte e comer no quarto. O Hotel é novo e a cama confortável para quem passa o dia caminhando pela cidade. Excelente custo benefício.

title: COME IN UN FILM...SULLA 5th STRADA
text:
Non so se salta subito all'occhio, per chi per la prima volta si appresta ad avvicinarsi all'affascinante New York, che questo hotel è il numero 15 della 5th strada incrocio 45th.
Si è nel centro nevralgico della città:
dietro al Rockefeller Center, a 10 minuti a piedi da Time Squeare, al massimo 15 a piedi da Central Park. 
Tutte le stazioni della Metro a uno sputo.
I civici vicini sono ristoranti e supermarket di ogni tipo.
C'è sempre qualcuno che ti apre la porta, che ti da una mano con il passeggino e offre un biscotto al tuo bambino. 
Non manca mai il sorriso. 
La hall è calda e accogliente dopo una lunga giornata turistica, e il grande tavolo centrale ti permette di goderti un pranzo o una cena che ti prendi da asporto se sei troppo stanco per consumarla altrove. 
Non mancano nemmeno le prese per i cavi USB dei nostri smartphone scarichi, rimpinzati di fotografie. 
La nostra camera era la 501 al 5° piano: bella, spaziosa e con una doccia davvero super! 
Sempre pulitissima con un phon capelli VERO e la macchinetta cialde per il caffè. La cassaforte, ed è vero: niente armadio ma tanti vani per poter riporre comunque tutto quello che serve per una vacanza. 
Ci sono anche qualcosa come 8 appendini e asse e ferro da stiro. Senza parole vero?!
A questo punto New York sarà ai vostri piedi...
Altra cosa: la colazione.
Minimal, certo! Ma in un paese dove il breakfast è un'istituzione ed anche un pasto vero e proprio, che consumato fuori costa dai 15 dollari a cranio, non si può pretendere di più da un hotel che include la colazione nel prezzo se non il minimo indispensabile per uno stomaco appena sveglio. La città vi darà il resto...
Come dice la tessera magnetica chiave delle camere...CITADINES IS YOUR HOME, IN NY!

♡

title: La nostra prima New York city
text: Hotel in posizione strategica in centro rispetto a qualsiasi cosa 👍 Camere piccole nello stile newyorkese ma comode e silenziose (eravamo al 22^ piano, camera x 4) comunque a New York non si va per stare in albergo 😁. Colazione basic in attesa del ben più corposo breakfast necessario per affrontare gli almeno 20 km giornalieri di passeggiata in questa incredibile città.

title: Annoying stay - never back
text: Rooms are very small and too simple for the price being paid. The view is incredibly poor and there isn't barely any light or lamps in the room. Be careful with the iron as it was all rusty and ruined a shirt. The breakfast might be free but it's worse than what you will find in a cheap hostel.

title: Hotel well placed within Manathan. Confortable
text: Hotel well placed within Manathan. Confortable and clean. Excellent for a short trip in New York to discover quickly the core of the town. The hotel was in work and the breakfast was simple. I recommand.

title: Irritating stay
text: Arrived at 1am and they put us in a room that was difft from what I had booked.  A smaller one!  Their excuse was the room was under repair.  If i know, they gave my original room to someone else earlier.  Then they told me we had to vacate the room at 11am the next day to transfer us to the correct room..  and voila instead of being  able to rest again, we had to comw back at 3pm coz that would be the time the room would be available.  All the inconvenience without even offering us for a discount at least to make up for it.

title: Sehr gute zentrale Lage, saubere und gute Zimmer,  nicht für Rollstuhlfahrer geeignet
text: Das Hotel liegt sehr zentral, die Zimmer sind sehr sauber und der freundliche und korrekte Service ist äußerst um die Gäste bemüht. Wir hatten ein sehr ruhiges Zimmer im 9. Stock mit Blick in den Innenhof. Das Frühstück war zwar äußerst mager, aber dafür gibt es viele Alternativen in der Nähe. Für Rollstuhlfahrer ist das Haus nur dann geeignet, wenn der Rollstuhl sehr klein und kurz ist, denn es gibt enge Wendekreise in den Gängen des alten Gebäudes. Die Duscharmatur ist vom Duschsitz aus nur zu erreichen, wenn man aufstehen kann. Die hohe Schwelle vor dem Bad ist zwar abgeschrägt, aber man benötigt einige Kraft, um den Höhenunterschied von ca. 5 cm  zu überwinden. Die Durchfahrt zwischen Bett und Schreibtisch ist nur durch sehr schmale Rollstühle zu bewältigen. Ansonsten ist dieses freundliche Haus vorbehaltlos zu empfehlen und als wir buchten, war es preislich wesentlich günstiger, als die meisten vergleichbaren Angebote in der Nähe.

title: Location, location, location!
text:
If a review is just based on location then this would be a 5.  Near Times Square, Rockefeller Center and Broadway!  Tucked in two musicals when we were there.  “ D” metro subway stop  just 5 minutes away.

We had a deluxe double bed room because we had our young Daughter with us.  A modern room (no Cabinets just a hanging rod) with a fine bed with 4 soft pillows per.

Sleep was good due the bed but interrupted intermittently because of the AC (hot spring days) which would blow gusts of strong  air every so often. 

Breakfast was esthetic continental - cereals, juices, milk, yogurt in neat boxed type packaging piled along  the cabinet lined Walls surrounding  a long common table.  Two kinds of fruit in its natural state piled.  The common breakfast cum lounging room saddled the reception. 

A very small lobby and reception area -  too crowded for the number of rooms.  Hated the very slow aging elevators.  Give 5 to 10 minutes to get the down or up during peak breakfast and check out times, 9 to 11 am.

Service was perfunctionary in all areas, abrupt, cold and sedate.  

Our lavatory sink kept on leaking slightly, a nice engineering guy would come and fix it.  Twice in that week.  The toilet was small but clean and new, water had air pockets so it was squirty though.  Bereft of toiletries, only soap, conditioner and shampoo - like a two star motel.

I would probably consider staying again because of the location.

title: Hôtel très bien situé
text:
Personnels très accueillants et très serviables !

Possibilité de laisser ses bagages à l'arrivée et au retour ce qui est un réel point positif.

Chambre petite ainsi que la literie. C'est propre si nous ne déplaçons pas les tables de chevet où la poussière est très présente. Les chambres donnant sur la cours sont très bruyante !

L'espace petit déjeuner est très très petit au vu du nombre de chambre dans l'hôtel.
Nous avons dû quelques fois déjeuner debout ce qui n'est pas très agréable.
Petit déjeuner très basique (Lait, céréales et fruits). 

Pour conclure, je recommande cet hôtel qui est très bien situé entre la 5TH et Times Square.

title: Cher payé !
text:
358 dollars pour une nuit passée  dans cet  hotel au demeurant fort bien situé  à 5 minutes de Times square, c'est cher payé !
Le lobby est agréable avec sa bibliothèque murale  mais les chambres sont petites , mal agencées , quand on pénètre dans sa chambre , on tombe directement sur la salle de Bains , c'est surprenant , le lit est large et confortable  mais le bureau est petit  et il  y a peu de rangement et la télé était bloquée sur 1 seule chaine .
La vue  sur la cour intérieure donnait sur les poubelles. 
Donc peu de motif de satisfaction  notamment pour le rapport qualité prix !

title: Visita di new York
text: Ottimo hotel a due passi dalla 5 av e a time square. Le stanze sono grandi e pulite. La colazione è servita nella hall lo spazio è un po' piccolo ma se scendi in tempo cibo c'è ne in abbondanza. Lo staff è gentile peccato che non parlino italiano ma mi hanno capito lo stesso. Ve lo consiglio

title: RUN AWAY!!!
text:
This hotel was tiny, nasty, and smelly. The staff were rude and completely unhelpful-even the few who spoke English.
We checked out the next day and switched hotels. I would have never stayed 1 night there but they would not cancel my reservation without charging me.
There were bags of trash constantly piled up in front of the hotel, to the point where we had to go out a side door. And yes, I know there is trash on the streets in NYC...but this was beyond excessive.

title: Piccolo e pulito
text:
Punti a favore: pulizia e posizione, centrale e vicino a tutto.
Punti a sfavore: dimensione delle camere se pernotti in 4 nella stanza anche se comunque fattibile, pessima accoglienza del personale ma da italiana posso in parte capire e la colazione.
4 prodotti che terminano subito con orario fino alle 9.30, alle 9.32 hanno già tolto tutto!

title: Absolutes Mieserables Hotel
text:
,,0 Punkte'' für dieses miese Hotel

Totales Unfreundliches und Unfähiges Personal
Zimmer wurde uns im Keller zugewiesen obwohl wir ein andrres gebucht haben bei 300 Dollar pro Nacht darf man mehr verlangen!!!!
Zudem mussten wir dass Zimmer im vorraus Bezahlen was Absolut unüblich ist.
Bei der Reklamation waren sie sehr unfreundlich  man uns abgewiesen und der Manager war nicht zum Gespräch Bereit!!!
In Zukunft werde ich dass Zimmer vor der Bezahlung Begutachten ....

title: La ubicación lo mejor.
text:
Está fabulosamente situado.El personal muy majo, especialmente un chico que estaba durante los desayunos, no recuerdo el nombre.Todo bien excepto una familia de ruidosos que  nos tocaron en la planta que eran unos maleducad
os.Pero de eso no tiene culpa el hotel.

title: Parfait pour un séjour
text:
Partis 4 nuits parfait, fonctionnel, propre, jolie.
Personnel super sympathique.
Vue pas trop jolie depuis la chambre mais nous ne faisons que dormir donc pas obligé d'avoir une belle vue.
Près du métro et de central Park.
On recommande.

title: Centrale ma non infernale
text: Vicinissimo a Time Square, permette di raggiungere a piedi le principali stazioni della Subway e tutta Midtown. Stanze piccole (comunque nella media di NY per questa categoria) ma ben equipaggiate. Se non fosse stato per un vicino di stanza maleducato con la tv troppo alta sarebbe stato un soggiorno perfetto. Comunque è un albergo da tenere sempre in considerazione.

title: Family Holiday
text:
Took a family holiday here in December and left on December 24th. Hotel is very clean and staff are very friendly. Travelling with our adult children at 22 and 16 this hotel was really good. It’s great that breakfast is included and was just enough to set you up till lunch, (something that is free). Even if there wasn’t enough chairs you could take this back to your room. Breakfast was Cereal, porridge, fresh fruit and muffins, yoghurts, milk, tea and coffee(which included decaf tea and coffee and green tea). Great Lobby area that’s a nice place to sit. Hotel was in a great location and was quiet away from the noise of being on a avenue where we previously stayed.
Beds were cleaned each day and fresh linen was brought.
Room and bathroom were cleaned on a daily basis.
Would stay here again if we ever returned to New York.

title: Great location but disappointing breakfast
text: This hotel lies in the heart of Manhattan. The rooms are clean and reasonable of price for its location. The subway is close-by so connections to all major attractions in New York is assured. Only the breakfast is below any level for this price category. No bread, no toast, nothing one would expect from a decent breakfast. Only (bad) muffins, oatmeal and children's cereals. There is also way too little space in the room. Half of the guest had to stand up while eating breakfast or they took some items to their room to eat there.

title: Great mid-town location, with inconveniences
text:
The room was a good value for the money, but ... had to keep the bathroom door closed tight because of a leaky / noisy toilet, and after an hour of trying, I could never get the TV turned off - so I had to sleep with a mask on. Then and 6:00 am, someone walked into my room. Needless to say, not a restful night. Lame "breakfast".
Without these problems, this would have been a solid value for the neighborhood.

title: Muy buen hotel, impecablemente ubicado
text:
La ubicación del hotel es impecable. Las habitaciones son lindas, limpias, con buenas camas, muebles y buena ropa de baño.
Se podría mejorar la atención del staff en recepción, pero tampoco es que fue especialmente mala.
Lo recomendaría.

title: Excellent service & felt like home
text:
I stayed at Citadines for three weeks between February and March 2019 and it was such a wonderful experience, I was sad to depart at the end of my stay.

The service I received from the staff was truly exceptional going far above and beyond anything I anticipated before my arrival. I particularly remember Olalekan, Evelyn and the manager who were friendly, welcoming and attentive to any needs or requests during my stay.

The location is perfect to make the most of your time in New York and visit various attractions from Central Park to Time Square to the Empire State Building.

In addition, the beds are extremely comfortable and the cheese muffins at breakfast are delicious.

I look forward to future visits! 😊

title: Recensione hotel
text: Hotel buono per la posizione ma ogni volta che tornavamo in stanza uscendo anche la mattina presto intorno alle 8 al rientro verso le 17 la stanza non veviva mai pulita e non venivano cambiati gli asciugamano da questo punto di vista è veramente pessimo. Inoltre la colazione è ripetitiva e costituita soltanto da cibo preconfezionato tipo merendine e yogurt e si fa su un tavolo unico piccolo e non adeguato al numero di affluenza e molti utilizzano il tavolo per usare il computer senza che lo staff dica niente lasciando le persone che dovrebbero fare colazione in piedi. Non ci tornerei più

title: Great value in a great position
text: Stayed 5 nights. 3 of us. 2 double beds in the room. Yes, the room is compact but certainly big enough unless you plan on actually living in it. But let’s face it, it’s New York, you just need a base to crash in after a long day. Room was immaculately clean. Staff were friendly. Bed was comfortable. Didn’t have any issue with noise. Breakfast is a bit of a scrum but it’s not a big issue really.

title: buena estancia
text: Lo mejor de todo la cama. Enorme y muy cómoda. El personal de recepción amable y siempre dispuesto a ayudar. La situación perfecta. nuestra reserva incluía el desayuno y ahí es donde pongo el pequeño defecto ya que no había mucha variedad pero aún así no estaba mal

title: Satisfeita com o hotel!!
text: Hotel reformado, parece novinho! Compacto mas cumpriu tudo que estava no anúncio e também minhas expectativas, imaginei que o quarto era menor mas é um tamanho ok.. realmente com muitas malas fica complicado abrir todas mas é o padrão NYC temos que ter isso já em mente. Tudo novinho e limpo adorei essa parte, ficava feliz depois de andar muito pela cidade e saber que tinha uma boa cama me esperando. Pelo mesmo custo benefício c ctz voltarei a me hospedar no hotel! Localização maravilhosa.

title: Super centraal
text: Je zit middenin de bruisende stad. De hoek om en je zit bij Times Square, de winkels op fifth avenue en Rockefeller center.  Het hotel is klein maar wel schoon. Verder niet heel bijzonder maar prima als je heel de dag op pad ben. Ontbijt is slecht maar tegenover het hotel zit Starbucks waar je je ochtend kan starten met lekkere koffie.

title: Buonissimo
text: Abbiamo soggiornato dal 08 al 13 Marzo io e ed una mia amica. Struttura in centro, a 5 minuti a piedi da Times Square e 10 da Central Park, direi una posizione strategica!! Il personale molto gentile e disponibile.. Camera  pulita e cambio asciugamani quotidiano. Unica pecca, ma per le nostre aspettative, la colazione con pochissima scelta...ma ė proprio un appunto non una critica negativa.  Spero di poter tornare presto!!!

title: Walked in on other guests
text:
After a lengthy check in process I entered my room to already find it occupied by other guests which is pretty embarrassing to say the least. Went back down to reception and I didn’t even get an apology absolutely shocking. 

The building is very narrow so the rooms are very close to the lift entrance so just hope no late arrivals other wise you will get a nice awakening if your a light sleeper. 

I didn’t get the room, again no apology or refund just no other room was available after I can only assume a double booking after I walked in on other guests in which was the room allocated to me. However the bed was lovely the bather room was perfect for my needs. 

Some of the shower gel and conditioner was half used this did not bother me but may others. Wifi was fast and free always a must with good USB ports close to the bed for easy charging. Good size tv with plenty of channels to keep you occupied if needed.

Skip breakfast it maybe free but its pretty pointless and the coffee sucked, most of the time its so crowded in the lobby you can’t get to the free breakfast any way. As I said skip this and grab something on the go!  

Great location for Times Square and central Manhattan. 

In all I would consider staying in another Citadines hotel again, possibly just bad luck at the start of this visit.

title: Hôtel très propre, à deux pas de Times Square
text:
J’ai passée un séjour de 8 nuits dans cette hôtel, rénovée donc en parfait état, les chambres sont grandes, le personnel aimable compréhensif par rapport à la barrière de la langue, à proximité de Rockefeller Center, Grand Central Station, Times Square etc... Je vous recommande a 100% si vous passez à New York ! 

Seul bémol que je lui donne c’est qu’il ne faut pas compter sur le petit déjeuner qui se résume à une bouteille de lait et des mueslis, je le savais déjà en allant dans cet hôtel du aux avis, après ne vous en faites pas vous avez Starbucks juste en face l’hôtel et pleins d’autres cafés pour déjeuner.

title: Citadines Apart Hotel
text: Chambre très propre et literie de qualité. Salle de bain coquette, avec jolie robinetterie fraîchement rénovée. Le petit déjeuner était très minimaliste et servi dans le hall d'entrée de l'hôtel. Les aliments proposés sont pré-emballés, muffins et céréales. Cependant des bananes et pommes sont aussi servies aux clients.

title: Glad Citadines is now in midtown Manhattan
text:
I've stayed at a Citadines in London twice, so I was happy to see they now have a location in midtown Manhattan. The NYC location has less than the international locations. I like the Ascott properties because they have access to washer dryers, which is nice as I'd rather handle my own laundry, and those properties have small kitchen areas. After a day of exploring, sometimes it's nice to come back, cook for yourself, and relax. The NYC location doesn't have that, but what it does have is a great location just blocks from Bryant Park. I used to live in NYC and was in town for a conference and to visit friends. Being in midtown made it very easy for me to get around whether I was heading uptown or over to Brooklyn. 

The staff was pleasant and helpful. Since I used to live in NYC, I didn't need too much hand holding, so I can't comment on how helpful they are regarding that. 

The breakfast can get busy. I got in the habit of coming down with a small bag to grab what I wanted and get some hot water for tea. The lobby is crowded with lots of folks mostly from Europe it seems. It's just too crowded for me, so I'd head back upstairs to eat. 

The next time I'm heading to NYC, this will be one of the first locations that I check.

title: Una genial estancia
text: Todo perfecto, desde la ubicación, la limpieza, el desayuno,el personal. No se puede poner ninguna queja. Alrededor hay sitios para comer y beber geniales. Las habitaciones muy limpias y de tamaño perfecto

title: Staying like a home
text:
We’ve stayed from 9th to 22nd Feb 2019 at Citadines, that was great the room was cozy like a home, and the staffs are friendly  and nicely to welcome us and our baby.

Location which was great to get to every spots with subway.

We had enjoyed this trip and will recommend to our friend who wants to travel in NYC.

title: Great location, free wi-fi, free breakfast and yes .. noisy
text:
Stayed here for 3 nights from Feb 19th. I read reviews saying the room is noisy with noise from doors and bad soundproofing. The Hotel replied back and promise people they will get them a better and quieter room the next time they stay there. So, this is what I did.. I contacted them to make an enquiry to place me in a quieter room. They answer me within 24 hours and assure me they made a notification to the hotel. I arrive on the day and reconfirm to the front desk that I made a special request. They got the notification alright. Once I was in my floor (6th floor) I was placed at the same floor with a group of young tourists from France. Let me tell you, in my floor there are only 6 rooms. All rooms more or less are not far from the elevator. So when a group of people from 3 or 4 bedroom from the same floor are talking in the corridor or 6 to 8 people talking in a bedroom, there is no way you can’t hear them. 
So,.. be ready to hear noise from the moment other rooms open their doors, close the doors and talking in the corridor while waiting for the elevator or even worse when they hang out in the corridor and talk. There is no way the hotel can give you a quiet room if all the room layout is the same as the 6th floor. Unless the floor you are in only occupied by you only or 2 other people who understand the situation and try to be decent and respected guests. I think it is a design flaw and they need to put more soundproofing material in the corridor and choose a better door closing system so they don't make too much noise.  
Having said all that, the location of the hotel is very good; it is in the middle of all I need to be. Room is always clean and you got free simple breakfast (be ready to wait for your table).

title: Super situation mais...
text:
Hôtel hyper bien situé à proximité de tout, literie très confortable, chambres peu spacieuses mais propres, personnel sympathique.
En revanche, le petit déjeuner inclus est inutile... une table de 15 places dans le lobby donc on prend son petit dej debout aux heures de pointes... petit déjeuner incluant fruits, yaourts, jus de fruits, muffins, céréales, thé et café imbuvable... et c’est tout!!! 
Autant proposer des chambres moins chères mais sans petit déjeuner...

title: excellent
text: une semaine dans cet hôtel très agréable où tout le personnel est aux petits soins pour les clients. Ne réussissant pas à télécharger ma carte d'embarquement de retour, le réceptionniste s'est démené pour me l'imprimer sur papier. Il était 01h00 du matin. Hotel très bien situé. Chambres très propres. Literie excellente.  Je me répète mais personnels en or. A faire et à refaire.

title: Excellent hotel
text: the hotel was clean and recently renovated. Staff is friendly and helpful. The breakfast was simple, but nice to start the day with it. location is perfect, many attractions within walking distance. we will return to the hotel in the future.

title: If you're over 20, don't even think about this hotel.
text:
Citadines Connect is a good option for kids who want a cheap, clean hotel and don't require much more than a bed in a decent tourist location near Times Square. Anyone else is going to be disappointed. SO much wrong, I won't cover everything here. But the things that stand out:

Rooms are very small - there is about a foot of space between the beds and the walls, 2 feet to the sort-of desk unit. There is no closet, no chest of drawers, just hangers on a bar and a couple nooks and small drawers in the desk unit. My room had two beds, one became my staging are so there would be a little room on the desk to work. WiFi is decent, but needs regular reminders. Mounted heater/air conditioner is noisy, but otherwise the room was quiet and the bed was comfortable. The message light on the phone blinks constantly - the hotel doesn't take messages, and they can't turn off the blinking. Electronic key entry never worked the first time: twice it worked on the 5th pass, once I had to go back to the lobby to get a new key. The TV system is run form a cable box under the desk and a remote. Don't aim the remote at the TV - it won't work. When I arrived it was set to Spanish speaking and a golf game I couldn't get out of. A tech guy came and showed me how to get other stations, but still in the Spanish system. This morning nothing worked. Another guy came, spent about 10 minutes with no luck, then went off to do something somewhere else. 10 minutes later things began working - and I now have TV, stations I couldn't get yesterday and options in English. Other reviewers have covered their very basic breakfast, served at one large communal table in the small lobby. The table between the beds has rounded edges: if things aren't in the center, they roll off onto the floor. The cheap adjustable lamp had two positions: up and down. Whatever would have allowed you to adjust it, was worn out. There are 22 floors and 2 elevators. If you miss one, expect a wait.

This is the kind of hotel you sometimes find in 3rd world countries: hastily and cheaply built. A client booked this hotel for me, but it's not suitable for business. Had I known in advance, I would not have made this trip, or would have booked my own room somewhere else. I seriously considered moving anyway, but figured I could stand it for one night. Hotels in New York are not expensive this time of year. For my needs, it would have been well worth paying more to have a decent hotel. Look closely at the photos online. Business travelers and grownup should not consider this hotel.

title: Comfy bed, but too loud
text:
Pros
- very comfy bed, one of the best I've slept in
- location is perfect for exploring mid-town
- very clean

Cons
- could hear noise from other rooms all of the time and the doors close very noisily
- difficult to access breakfast, very busy
- still awaiting return of $100 deposit (which we weren't aware was being taken) despite chasing and no response

title: C&C
text: Convenient and Compact.  Exceptional location, decent price but be prepared for efficient, compact layout.  From the lobby to the rooms - efficient use of space. Very efficient.   Staff was super.  Will definitely stay again

title: It was ok but..
text: The room was way too small for 4 people could barely move around and no where to put our luggage and also the water that came out the tap was cloudy which was very unpleasant and the smell coming from the aircon was abit funny

title: Hotel novo bem localizado, café da manhã e tamanho do quarto ruins
text:
Ótimo hotel, localização show! Perto da Times e 5ª Avenida, a três quadras do metrô. 
Únicas ressalvas são quanto ao tamanho do quarto e armazenamento. Não há guarda-roupa e quase não dá para armazenar as bagagens dentro do quarto, principalmente quando se vai no inverno e com muitos casacos. Não há espaço para armazenamento no banheiro também, não cabe nem uma necessaire na bancada, apesar de ser linda e novinha.
Outro detalhe importantíssimo e que me aborreceu bastante - O Hotel diz que tem café da manhã incluso mas não é verdade. O que eles servem de manhã é um conjuntinho de iogurtes e cereais, com café self-service. Isso não é café da manhã!!! Estou estarrecida!

title: Posizione perfetta
text:
Iniziamo dai lati negativi:
- guardaroba inesistente, una piccola panca e un misero appendiabiti.
- La colazione è solo con alimenti confezionati e sempre i soliti, nonostante il grande tavolo per fare colazione nell’ora di punta è difficile trovare posto per fare colazione, inoltre non è molto carino fare colazione così ammucchiati.
- Noi eravamo al 14mo piano e si sentivano i rumori della strada.
- il condizionatore a ventola è bello grosso e quando parte fa parecchio rumore, mi immagino in estate quando funziona in continuazione non deve essere piacevole.
Lati positivi:
- La Posizione favolosa!!! Ci siamo anche pentiti di aver fatto la metrocard settimanale, sarebbe bastato fare qualche biglietto sporadicamente oppure caricare dei soldi sulla card, perché è tutto così vicino!!
- La pulizia, nella media, bagno piccolo ma tutto sommato sufficiente e pulito.
Ci ritornerei? Sì se il prezzo è conveniente, noi non abbiamo grandi pretese per la colazione, mangiamo poco a quell’ora e comunque scendevamo prima della grande calca, la posizione è davvero perfetta per spostarsi e la pulizia è sufficiente.

title: Juste pour dormir
text: Hôtel très très bien placé à un bloc de Time square. Chambre de taille moyenne mais très propres mais attention cet hôtel inclut le petit déjeuner qui n’en n’est pas un puisque muffins, faux yaourts, céréales en boites et café et thé déshydratés sont là, le tout sur une table qui fait accueil, dîner devant le desk. Donc aucun service dans cet hôtel et attention il y a des chambres au Rez de chaussée devant ascenseur et des chambres en sous plex ( sous terre ) et vous passerez un très mauvais séjour.

title: Muy recomendable!!!!
text: Hotel muy céntrico, cómodo, limpio y el desayuno estupendo. El desayuno puedes desayunar muy bien sin problema. Ofrecen café, leche, zumos, yogures, cereales, madalenas, y fruta. Lo sirven en el hall del hotel. El personal del hotel muy amable y servicial.muy recomendable de verdad, era nuestra primera vez en NYC y temíamos por el hotel y de verdad que inmejorable.

title: Worst ever experience
text: Only positive was its good location. Construction noises next building started 10am and the house keeper keeps missing different amenity items every day. She doesn’t even respond when say hi. Complementary breakfast was only coffee/juice, muffin and yogurts. Receptionists are kind but all the other services were worst ever I have experienced.

title: Ideal for work & leisure
text:
Stayed for 9 nights in the 1 bed suite on the 10th Floor. The separate sitting room made it ideal to make late night work calls without disturbing the other. Good wifi, warm and very clean, good housekeeping. Bathroom a little cramped. Microwave, fridge and coffee machine in the room.
Great location, very close to good Asian takeaways, Italian, bars, pubs etc & of course 5th Ave. All staff were very friendly and helpful.
The quick packaged breakfast is enough to get you through until you can source a substantial meal.
Thoroughly recommend. Would definitely stay here again.

title: Fiyat performans oranı mükemmel
text: Odalar küçük. Biz üç yetişkin bir genç konakladık. Eşyalarımızı koymak için biraz daha fazla alan iyi olurdu ama yine de bizim için sorun olmadı. Banyodaki lavobo damlatıyordu. Personele ilettik ve hemen ilgilenip hallettiler. Herşeyi yenilenmiş bir otel ve temiz. NYC merkezde temiz, yatağı rahat, fiyatı uygun konaklama yeterli diyorsanız mükemmel. Kahvaltı beklentimiz yoktu. Lobbyde sunulan birkaç çeşit kahvaltılık tahıl, muz, elma, yoğurt, meyve suyu, süt. Bir o kadar lezzetli kafeinli/kafeinsiz filtre kahve. Siyah, yeşil, meyveli poşet çay. Personel güler yüzlü, yardımcı. Kesinlikle tavsiye ederiz ve tekrar konaklamak için tercih ederiz.

title: Piccolo ma accogliente
text: Posizione eccellente vicino a Times Square, Rockefeller Center,5th avenue, empire state building è molto altro. Unica pecca che la mattina quando scendevi nell’atrio c’erano gli ospiti in pigiama che facevano colazione. Un minimo di decenza!!

title: Boutique Hotel
text: This hotel is exactly what you need if you are trying to see the sights of NYC and just need a place to sleep and keep your things while you are out and about on the town!  Its clean, quaint, easy to get to and they even have a little continental breakfast with delicious coffee. The employees were all VERY nice and accommodating.  I don't think there was parking but we didn't need it.

title: Vale pela localização
text:
O hotel é muito bem localizado, fica próximo aos bons lugares da 5° avenida e também da time square, além do preço bem honesto.
O hotel aparenta ter sido totalmente reformado, tudo bem conservado, desde a recepção até o quarto.
Os atendentes foram todos atenciosos.
Infelizmente quando fui fazer o checkin só havia disponível 2 quarto, um no térreo e outro no subsolo, aí me fizeram escolher entre o mais barulhento (lavanderia) ou o barulhento (recepção), escolhi o do térreo que também era extremamente barulhento, durante a madrugada toda, pessoas entrando, saindo, barulho de elevador, eles não deveriam comercializar este quarto, quase não dormimos. Felizmente ficamos somente 2 noites.
O café da manhã oferecido é na verdade um café com bolinhos ensacados, banana, maça e iogurte, por algum desconto vale a pena ficar sem.

title: Ubicacion excelente
text: Hotel muy bien ubicado en el centro de nueva york (quinta avenida, central park, bryant park, times square..). Por poner una pega, nuestra habitacion no contaba con armario. Buen trato por parte del personal

title: Fantastic Location
text: Citadines have done it again with an outstanding location and reliable friendly service. Although the building is obviously dated and the rooms small, Citadines have done a marvellous job upgrading and making the best of the existing structure. Very comfy beds, good shower (for NY), good AC/heating and good WiFi. We got a great rate too!

title: Wirklich mieses Hotel
text:
- Diskussionen mit dem Perosnal (super zickig) 

- Beide Aufzüge defekt. Wir mussten bis in den 21 Stock laufen 

- Frühstück ist eine einzige Katastrophe
- man kann kein Fenster aufmachen
- 30 Minuten Feueralarm aufgrund von fehlender Wartung um 5 Uhr morgens 
- Kein Kleiderschrank im Zimmer 
- Nur eine einzige Lampe 

Einfach schlecht.

title: Great location but very small
text: Stayed here over Christmas 2018. Absolutely fantastic location. Close to everything such as Rockefeller’s, Times Square and short walk to Central Park. There are great bars and restaurants either side of hotel which was handy. We were a group of 3 adults in a room with two doubles. The rooms are very small and even smaller with all your luggage. However the rooms were really nice. Bathroom was lovely too with great shower pressure. Only has the free breakfast once as it wasn’t really our thing (museli and juice) but good to have a free bite before you start your day regardless. Breakfast was very busy though with lots of people and as the hotel is very small it’s very tight in the lobby, however beautifully presented. Only issue we had with our stay was often one of the lifts wasn’t working. This meant it took quite a while to get up and down as there was only one lift for everyone including staff. Took the stairs a few times but we were floor 14! However that aside it’s a great location and the price wasn’t too bad. I would consider staying here again if it were just myself and my partner as the room size would be more manageable! Staff very pleasant, the porters were fantastic.

title: Great location , bad customer service
text: My wife and son spent a few days up until the 17 October 2018, when we were finalising our bill which was paid in full. We come home too find that the hotel had taken two $100 dollar cash payments from the same credit card that I settled the bill. We approached the hotel a few times for a refund back to my card with e-mails back and forward with no resolution. Now had to pass to the credit card fraud department to resolve not impressed with service . Please check your cards for additional payments.

title: Posizione favolosa
text: Hotel situato in posizione eccellente, praticamente sulla 5’ strada, vicino alle principali attrazioni della Midtown e ad ogni punto di accesso della metro. Piccolo, moderno, pulito e uno dei pochi alberghi a New York con colazione, non di vastissima scelta ma da apprezzare. Hall dall’atmosfera più che accogliente, con tanto di caminetto. Lo consiglio sicuramente.

title: Classy-Comfy-Safe Citadines with Great Service-Management Teams
text:
After visiting NYC for our 8 day Christmas vacation, staying at Citadines Connect,  my husband & I agree that  we  couldn't  have selected a better place for Location (5-8 minute walk to 5th-Rockefeller Ctr), for Room Comfort (King Bed-lots of hot water in bath, internet connections, TV, KEURIG coffee service,(WOW), & a very peaceful rest , plus other amenities.  Yes, they do have mini-breakfasts, but many complaints that I read gave negatives about  crowdedness, lack of more items, etc.  MINI is the word not full breakfast.
We were happy that "Meagan's", an Irish restaurant next door has the greatest Irish Stew & Hello to staff there....
We would like to say Thanks to all who made our trip so uneventful but so restful and generous with info & service.  
Our advice to you....GO

title: Ubicacion y limpieza excelente, resto no
text:
Ubicacion privilegiada al centro, cerca de todo: times square, 5a avenida, byant park, rockefeler etc
La limpieza de las habitaciones y zonas comunes excelentes.
Por contra las fotos de booking difieren de la realidad, en internet son habitaciones modernas y por contra cuando llegas son antiquadas y algunas partes comunes muy viejas. 
Un hall de recepcion super pequeño
Destacar la mala calidad de la atencion del personal (almenos del que hizo el check in, una chica que en teoria nos oriento con pocas ganas y mal, porque nos envio a mas de 15 paradas de metro de lo que tocaba)
Desayuno prefabricado y sin espacio.
A las 06:30 de la mañana pasaban el aspirador por el pasillo , salimos a decir que no eran horas y no se repitio.
Lamentable estado de nuestra planta, la M, parecia el almacen de las personas de limpieza y no un pasillo con huespedes.
Si vuelvo no repetire

title: Decent Hotel not what I paid for.
text:
Wife and I checked into Citadines Hotel for a fun two day New York trip. We booked the Hotel on Hotwire and paid for a King Bed. When we arrived, we were told we did not pay for a king bed. Our reservation clearly states 1 room king bed 2 adults. The young lady at the front desk is very nice, but she blamed the mistake on Hotwire. Sadly she stated there were no rooms available with a king bed so we were basically stuck with two double beds. My wife and I were determined to not allow anything to ruin our trip. We took the room which was very nice and just dealt with it.

The Hotel offers free breakfast in the morning which isn't much of anything. Coffee yogurt cereal and some muffins. Breakfast is served in the lobby which I felt is very tacky. Too small of a space to have all of these people hoarding around. We skipped the free breakfast and went elsewhere. 

Customer service was good. Just make sure you get the room you pay for. That alone will have us not staying here in the future. I do not appreciate DECEIT!!!

title: Hotel céntrico con desayuno incluido
text:
Hotel céntrico, cómodo, y reformado, habitación grande con secador y encfufes USB

Por poner negativo, poco espacio en el.desayuno, poca variedad se repiten todos los.dias muffins y la misma fruta pero por lo menos incluye el desayuno, los ascensores en horario de desayuno tardan mucho en bajar y subir

title: Bad customer service
text:
I arrived at the hotel, and the guy at the front desk wasn’t able to log into his IT system to find my reservation. After he couldn’t find my reservation and couldn’t help me, I went to a different hotel for the night. I called Citadines the next day asking for an explanation and an apology at the least. The people working at the front desk were nice, and assured me the manager would give me a call. After trying to contact the manager all day with no response, I decided it wasn’t worth my time anymore.

Also, once the IT system was fixed, they couldn’t find my reservation even after I forwarded them the confirmation email for the reservation. I even booked the reservation through their website, not booking.com or equivalent.

If the manager had called me back and apologized, 
I would be much sympathetic for their IT issues.  The hotel gets 1 star because of the poor customer service.

title: Free luggage storage, free wifi and comfy bed
text: Comfy bed, very quiet taking account the location. Bathroom facilities were good. Good place if want to discover especially Times Square and Bryant Park etc... Wifi was good, even tho on 19th floor. Room was good size,  bathroom was clean and good. Nothing special tho. Free luggage storage, big plus for that. Housekeeping was friendly. Front desk stuff wasn't the friendliest or most helpful. Didn't get to experience the breakfast in neither mornings, was 2 mins late from it so was refused to get a cup of coffee. But breakfast looked like pre packed muffins and juice etc. My second night, mysterious smell of cigarettes came in to my room (on 19th floors?!?!), my jacket etc still smells like cigarettes smokes. Fire alarm kept going off in some of the room more than few times during the evening/night. Mentioned this to front staff at the night, nothing got done to it. Basic and clean hotel, definitely seen a lot worst but nothing mind blowing either. Nice refurbished rooms, but thats pretty much it.

title: Excellent location, friendly staff, good breakfast, free luggage storage
text: We stayed here for the October Billy Joel concert at Madison Square Garden.  The rooms were very comfortable.  I loved the pull down blackout shades that leave no room for cracks of light in the window.  I need those in my house.
